Title: High Reeper - High Reeper (Full Album 2018)
Description:
High Reeper (2018)
https://heavypsychsoundsrecords.bandcamp.com/album/high-reeper-high-reeper
https://www.facebook.com/HIGHREEPER/
http://www.heavypsychsounds.com/
''Formed in 2016, High Reeper is made up of Zach Thomas, Napz Mosley, Andrew Price, Pat Daly and Shane Trimble. Originally started as just a studio band, it rapidly became apparent that these songs were meant to be heard live and loud. The band made their debut in the Philly/DE stoner rock scene in early 2017 with success which was followed up by the recording of their self-titled debut in May. With a sound deeply rooted in modern stoner rock while still giving a nod to the earliest Sabbath records, High Reeper's first offering is driven by pounding rhythms, thick guitars and soaring, screeching vocals.''

Title: Boris Randall - All That Is Black (Full Album 2018)
Description:
All That Is Black (2018)
http://theborisrandallstore.bandcamp.com/
https://www.facebook.com/officialborisrandall/
Boris Randall has been spreading chaos and disorder with his music since the mid 80's. Things got heavy when he set out on his own in 1989 with his horror/hardcore punk band, The Splatterpunks. In 2001 Boris Formed and fronted another horror themed punk band called Hallowmas. Boris has worked with Rue Morgue Radio, Bill Hinzman, Necrophagia, Nokturne, Morgue Wagon, Children Of October, and more.   
The Boris Randall Store
East Liverpool, Ohio

Title: 1782 - 1782  (Full Album 2019)
Description:
1782 (2019)
BUY CD & Vinyl: https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop.htm#HPS106
BUY Cassete:  https://www.electricvalleyrecords.com/
1782 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1782doom/
In 1782 Anna G√∂ldi was condemned, she was tortured and killed, this was the last witchcraft trial in Europe.
In this debut album, 1782 deal with macabre themes: from spells to ruthless torture, from the pleasure of sex to the most perfidious revenge.
Seven tracks of pure Doom Metal sound with mega-riff Stoner Doom intervals, accompanied by a rhythm section of powerful drums, intense bass and super-fuzzy guitars.

Title: WINDHAND - Eternal Return [FULL ALBUM STREAM]
Description:
Order 'Eternal Return' Here: http://bit.ly/WindhandER
Digital Downloads/Streaming: http://smarturl.it/WindhandER
Subscribe to Relapse Records Channel: http://youtube.com/relapserecords

Tracklist: 

1. Halcyon (00:00)
2. Grey Garden (08:16)
3. Pilgrim‚Äôs Rest (14:46)
4. First To Die (18:03)
5. Light Into Dark (25:07)
6. Red Cloud (28:01)
7. Eyeshine (32:16)
8. Diablerie (43:18)
9. Feather (48:39)

Eternal Return, the fourth full length from Richmond, Virginia's heavy psychedelic quartet WINDHAND represents a new era for the group, a chrysalis moment that takes them to new and unforeseen heights. Across nine songs and 63 minutes, Eternal Return is an infectious display of songcraft cloaked in alluring atmosphere, molten fuzz, eerie psychedelia and ethereal vocals. The album was once again produced by Jack Endino (Nirvana, Soundgarden) with vivid artwork by Arik Roper (Sleep, High on Fire). Equally informed by heavy, fuzzed-out psych along with the iconic grunge / alternative groups of the 90s, WINDHAND have crafted a record brilliant in scope, powerful in execution, and perfect for an era of increasingly blurry yet still heavy borders.Ôªø

Title: GI√ñBIA - Plasmatic Idol (Full Album 2020)
Description:
Plasmatic Idol (2020)
GRAB YOUR COPY HERE:https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop.htm#HPS113 or
https://heavypsychsoundsrecords.bandcamp.com/album/gi-bia-plasmatic-idol
USA MARKET via ALL THAT IS HEAVY:https://allthatisheavy.com/search?type=product&q=plasmatic+idol
====
The new Gi√∂bia album ‚ÄúPlasmatic Idol‚Äù is simply impressive: a collection of different sounds and atmospheres, brings the listener to another sidereal world full of dreams and mind travels. You can clearly feel the influence of certain Pink Floyd in some passages but also pinches of Italian Progressive Rock, Horror Soundtrack from 70‚Äôs movies, garage 60‚Äôs influences, US West Coast Psychedelia, and late 60‚Äôs Space Rock a la Hawkwind The production is delicate and smooth, the album flows without interruptions and the music immerses your mind in a cosmic dimension. The vintage organs and synthesizers are used in the best way possible, 8 tracks that capture your attention without distraction. Recorded at Trai Studio in Inzago, Milano. Engineered by Fabio Intraina. Produced by Bazu the guitar player and singer of the band and mastered By Brett Orrison (Black Angels, Jack White) at Spaceflight Records in Austin, Texas. The Great cover album and artwork is by Metastazis.

The trio from Rostock is known for its heavy riffs, that try to crush you, switch to dreamy, almost shallow parts without distracting from the right path. It is probably just this very path, which drives the tension in the songs, builds up sprawling walls of sound and collapses by energetic and epic riffs.

Description:
1692 (2020)
http://frayle.bandcamp.com/
https://www.facebook.com/frayleband/
http://frayleband.com/
Heavy, Low, & Witchy. Frayle is a doom band from Cleveland USA. They draw their inspiration from bands like Sleep, Portishead, Bjork, Kyuss, & Black Sabbath, Frayle makes music for the night sky.
====
Aqualamb Records (US) and Lay Bare Recordings (EU). 
Order from: Aqualamb - US http://aqualamb.bandcamp.com 
Lay Bare - EUROPE https://laybarerecordings.com/release/1692-by-frayle-lbr028
====

Introduction (Arise) 00:00

6.
Dead Inside  15:56
7.
Burn  20:30
8.
Godless  24:42
9.
If You Stay   29:11
10.
Stab   33:36
====
 With '1692', Frayle pushes the immense intensity and gorgeous ache of its unique sound and style through to uncompromising new plateaus. The group's quantum weight, hypnotic rhythms, dark beds of sound, and the arcane female power of Gwyn Strang have coalesced into a sonic thumbprint both distinct and beguiling. As Frayle's music inhales and exhales, building into atmospheric, chilly epics, Gwyn's lyrics explore her own personality and experiences, referencing and representing her frustrations growing up in a strict Roman Catholic family, as well as alchemical ideals such as changing negatives to positives, or ascending from one level of understanding to another. While there is much darkness on the record, it‚Äôs also contrasted superbly with beauty, both fragile and fierce, in a way that feels weightless rather than plummeting, as if release truly is a possibility. 

"'1692', as the title of our album, references those who have been singled out and persecuted for their beliefs," says Strang. "‚ÄúWe strive to create a safe haven. A place to be vulnerable amongst the chaos.‚Äù
====
released February 14, 2020

In addition to vocalist Gwyn Strang and guitarist Sean Bilovecky, Frayle features drummer Pat Ginley, bassist Eric Mzik and guitarist Ellliot Rosen.

Das Konzert fand am 10.10.2018 w√§hrend des Crossroads Festivals in der Bonner Harmonie statt.

Lucifers Mitglieder kommen aus Deutschland und Schweden, ihre Basis ist allerdings Stockholm. Gr√ºnderin und Frontfrau der Heavy Rock Band ist die charismatische Berlinerin Johanna Sadonis.
Johanna Sadonis hatte bereits Erfahrungen in Death-, Doom- und Black Metal Bands - u.a. bei The Oath - gesammelt, als sich 2014 Lucifer gr√ºndete. In ihrem sehr authentischen Sound vereint die Band Heavy Rock im Stil der 1970er, Doom Metal und Einfl√ºsse aus Psychedelic Rock, ohne dabei wie eine Vintage-Band zu klingen. Zu den Haupteinfl√ºssen von Lucifer z√§hlen Bands wie Black Sabbath, Deep Purple, Blue √ñyster Cult, aber auch Heart oder Fleetwood Mac.
2016 zog Johanna Sadonis nach Schweden und fand in Hellacopters-Frontmann Nicke Andersson einen neuen musikalischen Partner. Ihr gemeinsames Werk ‚ÄûLucifer II‚Äú haben sie in Nickes Studio ‚ÄûThe Honk Palace‚Äú in Stockholm 2017 aufgenommen.

Title: Hour Of 13 - Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased (Full Album 2017)
Description:
Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased (2017)
https://shadowkingdomrecords.bandcamp.com/album/salt-the-dead-the-rare-and-unreleased
SHADOW KINGDOM RECORDS is proud to present a long-overdue demos & rarities collection from thee immortal HOUR OF 13, appropriately titled Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased. Across this massive collection, one will find HOUR OF 13's very first steps into doom metal godhood, alongside alternate recordings of fan favorites. 
====
Shadow Kingdom Records
https://shadowkingdomrecords.bandcamp.com/artists
https://www.facebook.com/ShadowKingdomRecords/
http://www.shadowkingdomrecords.com
Shadow Kingdom has released a massive amount of quality music, showcasing a wide variety of Metal music, from both new and legendary bands from the glorious past. 
====
1.
Call to Satan [Demo] 00:00 
2.
Submissive to Evil [Demo]  05:20
3.
The Correlation [Demo]  11:01
4.
Endurement to the Heirs of Shame [Demo]  16:46
5.
Grim Reality [Demo]  22:35
6.
Hex of Harm [Demo]  26:06
7.
Allowance of Sin [Demo]  30:28
8.
Missing Girl [Demo]      35:44
9.
Call to Satan [Chad Davis, Vocals]  43:58
10.
The Rites of Samhain [Chad Davis, Vocals]   48:29
11.
Upon Black Wings We Die [Tribute to Jason McCash]  53:46
12.
The Gathering / Call to Satan [Ben Hogg, Vocals]  59:22
13.
Submissive to Evil [Ben Hogg, Vocals]   1:05:42
14.
Grim Reality [Ben Hogg, Vocals]   1:11:23
***
Coming out on 3 additional formats: 
SKR125DCD (DIGIPAK) 
SKR125DLP 
SKR125CT 
Listening to Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased, it becomes quickly apparent that something truly special was being birthed upon the band's first recorded notes. The first half of this collection - or sides A and B of the double-vinyl edition - comprise demos recorded in 2007. The first three songs were the very first written by HOUR OF 13 in November 2006 and then recorded not long after; the next five songs were recorded nearly a year later. Together, these eight songs would form the foundation of the band's now-classic debut album, released by SHADOW KINGDOM as Hour of 13. Although recognizably HOUR OF 13, these early demo versions of the debut album's songs have slightly different arrangements while others have slightly different vocals, but every single bit of the band's trademark atmosphere is plentiful and poignant. Verily, this is the sound of lingering incense and burning blood. 

During the second half of Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased, we find a number of alternate recordings, some with special circumstances surrounding them. On side C is an alternate full-band recording of "Call To Satan," recorded at the HOUR OF 13 rehearsal spot, alongside an alternate version of "The Rites of Samhain" with fully correct lyric placement and vocals by mainman Chad Davis. But most poignantly is the song "Upon Black Wings We Die," written and recorded within a matter of a few hours upon hearing the news of the passing of Jason McCash from The Gates Of Slumber. On side D are the complete Candlemass Eve Recordings, the second rehearsal with Beaten Back to Pure's Ben Hogg on vocals: all recorded in a single session on a Zoom H2 microphone in the room, captured here with a newfound energy and stirring vocal performance. Feel the ancient atmosphere of early metal rehearsal rooms of yesteryear here! 

As founder Chad Davis states in the liner notes to Salt The Dead: The Rare And Unreleased, "This album documents the times and tribulations that had shrouded HOUR OF 13, the early days of rejuvenation along with the dark days of contemplation, and serve as a testament of an entity capable of withstanding any obstacle in its path." So far, the definitive HOUR OF 13 collection - and the cultest. Praise Him and enter the abyss! 

***
released March 17, 2017

https://twitter.com/KingWitchBand
https://www.instagram.com/kingwitchband
====
Formed in late 2015 in a dark cavern beneath the streets of old Edinburgh, a lead-heavy brew of old school Metal and the meatiest of 70‚Äôs classic rock emerges in the form of King Witch. Bristling with dark majesty, they draw comparisons ranging from Black Sabbath and Candlemass to Mastodon and High On Fire. The band quickly earned themselves a reputation as a formidable live act and have toured the UK and Europe as well as playing festivals such as Sweden Rock, Muskel Rock, Malta Doom Fest, Dutch Doom Days and Siege of Limerick.

After self releasing their extremely well received EP ‚ÄúShoulder of Giants‚Äù, the band were picked up by French label Listenable Records through which they released their debut album ‚ÄúUnder The Mountain‚Äù in February 2018.

April 2020 will see the release of King Witch‚Äôs highly anticipated second album ‚ÄúBody of Light‚Äù which further focuses their ability to fuse dense riffage with haunting yet powerful vocal lines and melodies. ‚ÄúBody of Light‚Äôs‚Äù wider dynamic range takes the listener on an electrifying journey from dark, brooding passages through to full-tilt Heavy Metal glory.

Title: Reverend Bizarre: Dark Sorceress (Autumn Siege)
Description:
Return to the Rectory 2005 Spikefarm Records
Finnish Doom Metal

Castle stands on the island of stone
It is surrounded by dark waters
Centuries on its place
For centuries more it shall do the same
Its history so cruel
The fort was cursed by eerie doom
There's a witch enclosed into the wall
No one knows exact place where
There's a tree on the wall
More than thirty feet tall
It is said its roots
Grew from the heart of sorceress
Every night she haunts
On the corridors of fort
Her restless soul
Wanders in those huge halls

Autumn long time ago
The colossal stone fort
Inside that dark walled castle
Beautiful young female dwelt

Dark Sorceress, daughter of the castle lord
Dark Sorceress, worshiper of the Ramlord

Dark witch used black magic
Gestic magic in the war
In war against warriors
Wielders of the curved sabres

Dark Sorceress, daughter of the castle lord
Dark Sorceress, worshiper of the Ramlord

Another stormy night during that autumn of fights
The enemy broke the gates and came with their sharp blades
Sorceress casted the spell to protect the castle
She performed her rite against intruders with sabres

Sky turned to dark
The sorceress drew the mark
Mark of the Ramlord in the air
Strongest thunderstorm was created
Lightning's everywhere
Electricity in the air
Lightning casted the shadow
Of the Ramlord onto the wall
Enemy saw that shape
And because of that they escaped
The shadow of the Ramlord
On the wall of black powered fort
(Behold) Dark Sorceress, daughter of the castle lord
(Hark) Dark Sorceress, worshiper of the Ramlord...!

‚ú† ‚ú† ‚ú†

(Barathrum cover)

Title: Stone Ship: The Eye
Description:
The Eye 2013 Under a Serpent Sun Records/Feuer Publications
Doom Metal (Lahti, Finland)
https://stoneship.bandcamp.com/album/the-eye

I. The Ship of Stone 00:00
II. The Crooked Tree 22:21

‚ò© ‚ò© ‚ò©

The Ship of Stone

[In lost spheres the trifold vortex brew 
As one: favourable illusions 
Tearing down as four angles 
Delusions may escape once again 

From a point a line 
from a line a surface 
From a surface the seas 
Through the vortical cross the death is spread] 

Open the gates 
Diffuse the breach of being 
Turn the seas 
Down to the frozen womb 

Sinking in the currents of abyssal hymns 
Pouring as a thickness of dreams 

The dark stream of cold water 
Squeezed into echoes and shapes 
Of circulating current beneath 
All from the same river mouth 

A crescentic boat is sailing 
In the valleys of the deepest well 
Carrying the rays of the Sun 
The patterns of depth's slumbering arts 

The Stone bell of doom 
The Doom bell of stone 
The coiling of the abyssal depth 

The coiling of the circles 
From which the weird is woven 
The dreamer's gate 
Pulsing through 

Following the shape of the black bird 
Guided above the night fog 
On the long path of the grave-fish 
All the threads must be known 

Above coniferous castles 
And the graves of the old 
The vortex evolves further 
As the ship of stone 

An ellipse with a dragon-like face 
Eyes see through the star ice cold 

Coated by the equinoxial night 
The wind salutes that sculpture 
The carvings which tend the stars 
Spiraling devotion 

Highest octaves of the winged sun 
Gather around the presence of the purple maid 
As the shoreless night floods upon 
Under of the turned seas 
Coniferous shadows whistle no more 

Serpentine motions, a presence so strong 
Oh, the fine worlds behind revealed 
Floating on the moulting fields 
In the rhythm of a geometrical sway 

Construction reflecting the structure of the universe 
The womb and the grave 
Navigated by the golden temple 
In the sea the fire should be found 

Ethereal vapours of strange light 
Dissolving away time and space 
Summoned by the crystal gate 
Countless eyes from the unspeakable planes 
Dissolving to the one... 

The continents melting to liquid 
Soaring up as mist 
The limits of space immense 
Are covered by stonen scales 

In the light of stones in the ring of dimensions 
Sounding the sea of endless space 
By the secrets of the purple maid 
Withdrawing within eternity

‚ò© ‚ò© ‚ò©

The Crooked Tree

Above the dimness of woods I wonder 
The boundaries of earth and sky 
The silence of this ever-burning grave 
Gazing the journey of the celestial bodies 

And how those distant fires carved their signs 
On the surface of the seas 
Reflections of the weight of the stars around 
Outlined against ambient serenity 

Thus rose the windy tree from thin air 
The revelation of the nightly shadow 
To rise from the rock 
To reach out towards the pole star 

Hear the chants from behind the waters 
When lines thicken drawn by the primeval light 
The angles of the transcendent current 
Woven by the depths of space 

The orbits and chords of stars assemble thousandfold 
As leaves around the abysmal stem 
The vibrant forms gather as a multi-dimensonal vision 
Ascending like the lily of the waters 

Thus rose the windy tree from thin air 
The revelation of the nightly shadow 
To gather from the rock 
Summoned by the eyes of the sky 

Like language is the tone of that flowery fir 
Its words as if spread by the wind 
Dim bewitching tongue from it's branches 
The pulse from beyond the stars 

Thus introduced the tree itself in the northwind 
Reciting it's name: the number of stars 
The one who absorbs from the deepest well 
From the depths of the unknown 

"Secrets of beingness, 
The hope of men 
Lies in the abyss 
'i' is the way, throughout the eight" 

To learn from the branches and leaves 
He rose to the tree of shadows 
Whose words are pronounced by the wind 

Nights in the grasp of branches 
Left foot spelling the fullness of space 
The sentiments of the hanged 
The centrifugal melody 

Along the spear's shaft 
I saw through the gates of death 
On the heart blood-dyed steed 
Swaying in the wind 

Hanging as a corpse 
I listened to the river's bed 
Noted the great sea-serpent 
From the signs on it's scales 
I fathomed it's true length 

The fermentation of the serpentine waters I hear 
The sights of the branches and leaves 
The principles of the phonetic foundation of space 
The entity of Being 

In the middle of the pitch-black sea 
I settled down 
Embraced the star abstractions 
To coil through the knotholes 

Steady, calm & tight 
I fall into the night 

‚ÄùOn that tree 
No man knoweth 
The roots beneath its growth‚Äù 

The Eye

‚ò© ‚ò© ‚ò©

Title: CBS: 70's Turkish Anatolian Rock Vinyl Set
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.

7th episode of the series called Coffee Break Sessions (CBS).
I played most of these records before, in the Turkish Anatolian Pop & Rock Ep 1-2-3-4 and 5. All of those videos are now blocked. 
So I thought, maybe it's a good idea to make a new one -without the ones that aren't available for use on Youtube. I played a few new records that I have. 

This episode is only Anatolian Rock records during the 1970s. I hope this new one will survive. The only reason why Baris Manco is not in this video is simply because of the copyright issues:( 
Hope you enjoy.
#vinylonly #turkish #anotolianrock

Title: Alunah - Awakening the Forest (2014 - Full Album)

Is there a doom band that sounds dreamier than Alunah? That‚Äôs a big reason I love this English band: they play heavy music rooted in the tradition of Saint Vitus, but the focus isn‚Äôt so much on brute force but grace. Alunah carve their own musical path merging elements of doom metal, psychedelia and classic rock, with earthy hypnotic vocal melodies. They formed in 2006 in the English Midlands, and have taken their songs of nature worship and English folklore all over Europe. #vinylonly #anatolianpop
This is the fourth episode of the Sunday Brunch Sessions with the support of Yemeksepeti Banabi! Since this channel doesn't make any money out of Youtube and ads, it's very vital for us to get support from brands. So, thank you Yemeksepeti Banabi. They are a Turkish online food delivery company providing the facility to place food orders online from an affiliated network of restaurants without charging the user any extra fees.

I made an episode of Turkish Female Singers back in August 2019 and the reaction from you was very positive. So I decided to make a new one. All records originally released in the '70s. I tried to pick my favorites but I must say there are tons of more records that didn't make it in the mix. Hopefully, I can make a third one in the future! In this mix, you will find some legends like Selda, Gulden Karabocek, Tulay, Seyyal Taner, and many more!

Title: Super Metroid - Brinstar Red Soil Acapella
Description:
An original a-cappella arrangement of the Brinstar Red Soil Swampy Area from Super Metroid.

This soundtrack has lots of memorable songs and this is one of my favorites.  When the melodies kick in after the ambient dark-chanting, it brings back memories of sitting alone at night playing this game for hours on end.  Such a good game with a super memorable soundtrack!

Amazing speedrun gameplay video credit goes to zoasty.  Check out his full run here - https://youtu.be/a8NU-aqfZgI

I. The Music of Despair 00:00

The Music of Despair

In the loneliness of winter
When I seek penance for my sins
I call upon my fate for mercy
Oh, let the king of diamonds win

When the lords of light are with me
I climb the stairs up to Ungol
When the angel witch she soothes me
I'm her witchfinder general

Doom is the soul of metal
Primordial and pure
Doom is the true essence of living
Immortal
My cure

When my heart is filled with sorrow
And I wonder who I am
I put on some ancient Trouble
Some old Vitus, Pentagram

When my soul walks in the darkness
Or life's hopelessness again
Then I find solace
I find comfort
And I learn and understand

At the blessed pagan altar
He kneels the reverend bizarre
And he calls me and I follow
Into the doomed world of my heart

There is beauty in the mourning
So much truth and tenderness
Let me celebrate the sabbath so black
The rites of candlemass

There is wisdom in the slowness
In the rhythm is the magic
In the air
And I know I've found salvation
In the music of despair

Title: Spiritus Mortis: The God Behind the God (full-length)
Description:
The God Behind the God 2009 Firebox Records/Svart Records
Finnish Doom Metal
Rise From Hell: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlYCnsjIiWE
From the Ultima Thule: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=APG0EKJl8FI

I. The Man of Steel 00:00
II. Death Bride 03:02
III. The Rotting Trophy 10:55
IV. Curved Horizon 15:04
V. When the Wind Howled with a Human Voice 23:34
VI. Heavy Drinker 29:21
VI. The God Behind the God 33:50
VII. Perpetual Motion 45:38

The Rotting Trophy

Suck the blood from my veins
Cut me down, desecrate my grave

Bleed me dry and burn my skin
Grind my bones, let the journey begin

Like an empty vessel
Desolate
You have it now
But my spirit reigns again

Now, you down!
The tide has changed
There is no way out
You are gonna pay

In my destination
There is no use for hands
The secrets of that world
The eyes cannot see
In the comfort of my earthly grave
Lies the rotting trophy
Of your shallow victory

I let the worms devour my flesh
I am done with this planet's bloody mess

When the Wind Howled with a Human Voice

People standing silently
Staring at the sky
The colours are gathering
Suffering trees sigh
There is no one to warn them now
No one to raise his voice
The shadow is passing by
All that is living is starting to die

The May rain will fall
The end of it all
The end of the world

Buried under the ruins of the city
Burnt by the shattering sun
The failure of the creation
The end has begun
Drifting in the river of life
Polluted by the human hand
The shadow passes by
No one left to stand

The May rain will fall
The end of it all

Nature cries, the view is shivering
Air is too heavy to breathe
Trees dance in anxiety
A civilization too proud
The concrete jungle collapsing, falling to dust
The angels of the blind god laughing
The lesson of Babylon forgotten centuries ago

Ears are bleeding
Under the waves of unbearable noise
Nature cries
The wind howls with a human voice

People standing silently
Staring at the sky
The colours there gathering
It's time to say goodbye
The end

The God Behind the God

Passionate onanists standing under the crucifix
The Heavens are pouring tears for the nailed one
A wall of flesh is build with human bricks
When the demiurge reigns supreme the true god is done

The false prophets of the Old Testament vomiting a thousand lies
Man-made rules tied together with the saviour's blood
But the ones within the truth are opening their eyes
Fearlessly encountering the god behind the god

Sacred names printed with gold on black parchments
Truth decoded from meaningless paraphrases
Underground sects performing pure sacraments
Summoning the hermaphrodite god of multiple faces

The children of Bethlehem are buried under the mourner's bench
But their souls dance high above in the Heavenly hall
Transcendental flowers cover the profane stench
At the feet of the Pharisees the Earth-bound maggots crawl

‚ÄùNow when the heavens had consolidated
themselves along with their forces and all their
administration, the prime parent became insolent.
And he was honored by all the army of angels. And all
the gods and their angels gave blessing and honor to
him. And for his part, he was delighted and continually
boasted, saying to them,

‚ÄùI have no need of anyone.‚Äù He said, ‚ÄùIt is I who am
God, and there is no other one that exists apart from
me. I will go before thee, and make the crooked places
straight: I will break in pieces the gates of brass, and
cut in sunder the bars of iron.

And I will give thee the treasures of darkness, and
hidden riches of secret places, that thou mayest
know that I, the Lord, which call thee by thy name, am
the God of Israel.

I am the Lord, and there is none else, there is no god
beside me: I girded thee, though thou hast not known
me.

That they may know from the rising of the sun, and
from the west, that there is none beside me. I am the
Lord, and there is none else.

I form the light, and create darkness: I make peace,
and create evil: I the Lord do all these things.

I, the Lord thy God, am a jealous god, visiting the
iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third
and fourth generation of them that hate me.‚Äù

And when he said this, he sinned against all the
immortal beings who give answer. And they laid it to
his charge.

Then when Pistis saw the impiety of the chief ruler,
she was filled with anger. She was invisible. She said,
‚ÄùYou are mistaken, Samael,‚Äù (that is, ‚Äùblind god‚Äù).
‚ÄùThere is an immortal man of light who has been in
existence before you, and who will appear among
your modeled forms; he will trample you to scorn,
just as potter‚Äôs clay is pounded. And you will descend
to your mother, the abyss, along with those that
belong to you.

For at the consummation of your works, the entire
defect that has become visible out of the truth will be
abolished, and it will cease to be, and will be like what
has never been.‚Äù

Title: Dungeon Weed - Mind Palace Of The Mushroom God (Full Album 2020)
Description:
Mind Palace Of The Mushroom God (2020)
http://dungeonweeddoomsludge.bandcamp.com/
https://www.facebook.com/dungeonweed/
WIZARD SLUDGE. Esoteric riffs, Deep Stream guitar solos, doom synth.
DUNGEON WEED
Oakland, California
====
1.
Orcus Immortalis/Vox Mysterium 00:00 
2.
Beholder Gonna Fuck You Up  06:47
3.
Sorceror with the Skull Face       13:03
4.
Black Pudding   18:28
5.
Lumbering Hell     25:43
6.
Mind Palace   33:13
====
It has been many years since I composed these songs. They came to me in the dark, these words and simple melodies, recited endlessly in my mind as I sat imprisoned in the darkness of isolation in His Majesty‚Äôs dungeon without quill or parchment for a crime of which I was, unfortunately, most guilty. Had I not pushed the boundaries of reality in a vain attempt to conquer Death itself, had I not unleashed hideous powers upon the kingdom that caused so much pain and destruction, had I not inflicted upon myself what may be the ultimate curse, had I not done these things I would be sleeping peacefully in the senseless, interminable abyss of nothingness and my name would be revered throughout history as a legendary sorceror. Alas, I did cause these events to unfold and nothing can change that now. His Majesty has been dead for nearly a century, yet I live on, shunned by the world, living secretly in the dark forests of the north until time ceases to exist. There are times when I question if this is truly reality, I wonder if I ever did return from the mind palace of the Mushroom God, that strange and terrible realm of imagination which I was so careless, nay, foolish, to invoke. No matter how I strive to avoid it, I inevitably catch a fleeting glimpse of myself in the dark forest stream and see the ghostly bones of my face and know it is real. I shudder in fear and disgust to think of my encounter with Orcus, immortal Lord of the Underworld and now my master, forever, until he sees fit to release me from my necromantic servitude.
====
released August 19, 2020

Dmitri Mavra: guitar, bass, synth, vocals
Chris McGrew: drums
Thia Moonbrook: backing vocals


Music, lyrics, recording, & art by Dmitri Mavra
Drums recorded by Chris McGrew (Wally‚Äôs Hyde Out, San Francisco)
Mastered by Myles Boisen (Headless Buddha Mastering Labs, Oakland)
Fuzzy Mind Records 007
¬©2020 Dmitri Mavra

Ascending

A dark disease
Choking us slow
We go in a row
Down towards the abyss
But few chosen
Know the solution
They hold the key to
Ascending from pestilence
Rise, now, die, now

Road to the Fire

I travel, on a road
In the eye, reflects a burning‚Ä¶ horizon
Road to thee, fire
Road to thee, fire
The dust, behind me
Remains in, forgotten‚Ä¶ memories
Road to thee, fire
Road to thee, fire
Devoured by the flames

Eat the Sun

Fly away

Without knowledge
The sun
Is burning

Everything‚Ä¶

Is drowned in

Eternal Sleepwalker

Title: Ancient Days - Black Widow \ Black Widow - In Ancient Days (1970)
Description:
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre humbled, honored, and stoked to be able to share a split with Black Widow.
We‚Äôve been talking to Kip Trevor for a couple weeks now. So we mentioned doing something like this to show homage to a band where we got our name ‚Äúancient days‚Äù from. He was into it and so here we are. Maybe we‚Äôll be lucky enough to released on record.‚Äù - Ancient Days 
https://ancientdays.bandcamp.com/
https://open.spotify.com/artist/4jEEx3QRRYYIqSg5qt4h6F?si=ZUocLcHpSmWAicSGzI9YiQ
Heavy psych , doom rock n roll.
Ancient Days
Indianapolis indiana
----
Black widow was a rock band that formed in Leicester, England September 1969. 
The band was mostly known for their early use of Satanic and occult imagery in their music and stage act. 
http://blackwidowrockband.co.uk/
The band originally formed in 1966 as Pesky Gee! With Kay Garrett (lead vocals) , Kip Trevor (lead vocals, guitar, harmonica), Chris Dredge (guitar) Bob Band(bass) Clive Box (drums and piano) Gerry ‚ÄúZoot‚Äù Taylor (organ) Clive Jones(sax and flute) Jim Gannon (guitar and vocals) replaced dredge in 1969. The band released one album for Pye records as Pesky Gee! 1969‚Äôs Exclamation Mark , before Garrett left the band. The remaining band members continued on as Black Widow and released their debut album Sacrifice in 1970.

Black Moon Mother blends light and heavy soundscapes that pull from elements of psych rock, pop, doom metal and shoegaze. LOST IN THE MAZE

Ancient ones are waiting
Underneath they‚Äôre saving
All their light
Packed deep inside
We must search
Every living being
Earth and tree and seedling

Light in the dark

On us now

Intricately waving
Celebrating craving
The other side
Watch your mind
In we go
Every little facet
Glistens with the habit
Right between the eyes
Timeless time

High winds fall
On us now

Always moving on

Along the way
Pieces will stay

Just like a child
With curiosity
Along the way
Pieces will stay

Dispel the myth
Embrace the lift
In heavy times
The flame is alive

Always moving
Onward on
Riding toward that setting sun

--------------------------------------------------------------------

SLOW DOWN

Feel the strain of truth and whim

Here we are, we‚Äôre alive, one

Slow down
Two hands on the ground
Feel the air we breath

Here we are, we‚Äôre alive, one

Feel the air we breath

Oh radiant sun

Creation is blood
Soil is mud
We knew not of your worth
But you were the one who made all the fun
And now all we‚Äôve got is ‚Äúsorry‚Äù

We‚Äôre so sorry

Radiant sun
Who are you?

Title: Rare Turkish Anatolian Rock, Funk & Jazz
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
-----------
This is the second episode of the new mini series called Portable Sessions. During the summertime visit to my home city Istanbul, I decided to take a pair of portable turntables with me, and record a vinyl set episode with some amazing views in different parts of the country. My second stop is Ovacik, in Cesme/Izmir.
Because I live in London, whenever I get a chance to visit home in Turkey, I try to buy as much Turkish records (mostly 45's) as I can. And this time was no exception. In this portable session, I am playing some of to hardest to find records from Feride, Mogollar, Deniz Erkanat, Dario Moreno, Ferdi Ozbegen and more.

Special thanks to Ali, Banu and Alya Kanibelli.

Big shout out to Yemeksepeti Banabi, who's supporting this series! Since this channel doesn't make any money out of Youtube and ads when it comes to vinyl set episodes, it's very vital for us to get support from brands. So, thank you Yemeksepeti Banabi.
-----------

====

https://www.facebook.com/burningworldrecords

====
01 - Caliphate Obeisance   00:00

02 - Sadomancer     00:44

03 - Shadow Heathen      11:00

04 - Receptor Antagonist       21:13

05 - Aetheronaut - Permadose  31:28
====
It took a lot of hard work and a few cast changes to get this together. Evan, our guitarist and vocalist, had been traveling the USA from New Orleans to Oregon and everywhere in-between, hitch-hiking and even hopping the occasional freight-train, trying to make something happen. At first, we met up in Texas under the name Maenad but were again torn apart. Finally, we all locked ourselves in a basement studio at AMP rehearsal studios in LA to flesh out the bones of this first album.

It sounds exactly like what it is: the combined frustration, hatred, depravity, and despair that came from years of dredging the gutters, drug dens and 5 dollar shows across the USA for something meaningful, something real.

We are Somnus Throne and we are from all over the USA.
====
releases September 24, 2020

Evan - Guitar/Vox
Haley - Bass
Luke - Drums

Recorded at Gear Godz/We Make Noise Studio in Los Angeles, California by Miami Dolphin and Mazen Ayoub

Mixed/Mastered in New Orleans, Louisiana by Hightower Studios

Final Masters done by James Plotkin

Eye of Doom is a progressive doom metal trio which combines traditional fuzz-driven stoner/doom with progressive and space rock elements from the ‚Äò70s to evoke a unique and interesting sound. With dimensions reaching far beyond the sonic soundscapes typically found within the genre, Eye of Doom explores uncharted territory.

The riff-moulding for Curse of the Pharaoh was produced and recorded by the band in early 2020. The songs on this EP draw inspiration from the grand scenery found in the towering mountain ranges and vast forests of the band‚Äôs hometown, as well as exploring existential questions connected to topics such as mysticism, astronomy, paganism, and the occult.

Enter the RIFFTUAL!

We‚Äôve been shackled from the womb
Lived our lives like men entombed
Subjugated under heel and bloody lash
And we toiled with sword in hand
Spilling blood on Roman sands
We‚Äôre a waking viper coiled around their necks
Like razors to the flesh
Down the vines to certain death
We die free
Through divine rite
We descend into the black
We may never come back
We die free
Through divine rite
Rise! We are fury, we‚Äôre the end
Their backs are exposed as we descend
Rush - decimate their legionnaires
Flay - open flesh, no one is spared
Loose the arrows, charge the wall
Before they sound the battle call
Seize trebuchet and Roman steel
Time for imperials to kneel
No time to mourn what we have lost
Our freedom comes at such a cost
Make them beg us for their lives
No quarter! No one will survive

üïà üïà üïà

Trampled into the Earth

They come forth the vanguard of doom
Vast as sight their banners of war
Hear them sound their Clarion horn
Trampled into the earth!
Scarlet flames reach into the sky
Choking embers blot out the sun
Oh our cities razed ash
Trampled into the earth
Ruin has come for us all
Steel on steel, burial ground
Under their venomous gaze
Visions of darkness, are visions no more!
A plague to rob you of breath
Behold the bringer of death
Of death
Of death
Their death a stain on our soul
Steel on steel! Blood, it shall flow
Clawing our way to the grave
Vanquished lie dead, trophied remains!
Until there‚Äôs no one left
Behold the bringer of death
Death
Ravens feasting upon their bones
Skulls piled high like mountains of stones
Soon their hunger rises again
Trampled into the earth!

üïà üïà üïà

Two Coins for the Ferryman

You‚Äôve come from afar
Thread cut from the skein
You dare to tread here
Where all must come clean
You can take your soul
Leave the rest ashore
Take your soul
All your weight must go
This skiff has seen finer days
The ages haven‚Äôt been kind
If you weigh her down
You‚Äôll be lost for all time
You can take your soul
Leave the rest ashore
Take your soul
All your weight must go
A pauper bearing empty hands
A king with riches and demands
A warrior‚Äôs medals and his fame
Just clear the gangway of those claims
A seer bringing words of dread
A courtesan adorned in red
A politician and his lies
Will surely make us all capsize
We sail down the Styx
We‚Äôre destined for home
Eternity waits
This life all I‚Äôve known
You can take your soul
Leave the rest ashore
Take your soul
All your weight must go
You can take your soul (two coins for the ferryman)
Leave the rest ashore (two coins for the ferryman)
Take your soul (two coins for the ferryman)
All your weight must go (two coins for the ferryman)
Once battle scarred
Now spineless men
All greed and power
Indifference
Let it go!

üïà üïà üïà

Release date 30 October / Pre-order at:https://littlecloudrecords.com/collections/frontpage/products/alien-mustangs-beat-of-the-earth-pre-order?fbclid=IwAR2zzaFyN3U6uUlJoNozo7vOnslUoqZHAuuPs-tDQQA40OuPo-cWbqc_KqM
----
Bandcamp:https://cful.bandcamp.com/album/alien-mustangs-beat-of-the-earth
----
Cardinal Fuzz and Little Cloud Records are delighted to bring to you for your listening pleasure ‚Äì Alien Mustangs ‚Äì ‚ÄòBeat Of The Earth‚Äô.
Emanating sonically (and physically) from Thessaloniki, Greece, the band has been crafting its unique blend of '60s-flavored, hypnotic, space-psych trippiness since 2013, releasing their debut LP "Alienation" in 2018 (on the always great Sound Effect Records) - this follow up 'Beat Of The Earth' is a shimmering wash of the most lysergic, cosmic and melodic music to have reached out ears so far in 2020.
Their mutant psych / space hybrid is deeply rooted in sixties garage, and while still paying tribute to their influences,(((Loop))), Spacemen 3, The 13th Floor Elevators and The Stooges, ‚ÄòBeat Of The Earth‚Äô has a Teutonic beauty that brings to mind Harmonia.
Opening tracks ‚ÄòSound Of No Future‚Äô and ‚ÄòFairy Meadows‚Äô are both super- kosmische space rock epics where Alien Mustangs create an alluring, thick miasma that practically invites you to lose your bearings in their incandescent, the hallucinogenic cosmic glory.
On the flip over and we get Alien Mustangs in a fuzzed up Stooges pounding strung out guitar grind, where tidal waves of guitar drones detonate in your mind, Hawkwind inspired freak flag wildness flies with an added dose of motoric krautadelia. ‚ÄòBeat Of The Earth touches down gently with he lilting ‚ÄòWaiting The Dawn‚Äô ‚Äì a track that shimmers and glides with serene beauty as you melt blissfully into the ether of its serene beauty.
Beat of The Earth is presented to you in a 350gsm Sleeve and pressed on Ltd Galaxy Yellow marble Vinyl and Black Vinyl. 
====
released October 2, 2020

Title: The Wandering Midget: Family Curse
Description:
The Serpent Coven 2008 Eyes like Snow Records
Finnish Doom Metal
https://thewanderingmidget.bandcamp.com/album/the-serpent-coven
The Serpent Coven: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t22OLDqEP7A
Family Curse inspired by House of Usher (1960) 
‚ò†Ô∏è ‚ò†Ô∏è ‚ò†Ô∏è

A hatred curse runs in our family
Spreading like ashes with the wind
It would reach the outer world
If I opened my chamber door

For hundreds of years
We've dwelled on these plains
Where the thick mist always lays
Covering this house that we're in
Dark windows and pale brick walls

Slayers and rapers, maniac stalkers
Sleep in my basement tomb
The caskets are set for her and me
Though our souls will be never set free...

Our family's scarred in so many ways
All torments a man may gain
We've suffered in silence, yet still aware
Proud of who we once were

Slayers and rapers, maniac stalkers
Sleep in my basement tomb
The caskets are set for her and me
Though our souls will be never set free...

As the years roll by we will stay the same
Godless hands once built this grave
Where death and darkness reign

"My eyes are tormented by all
but the faintest illumination.
Odours assail me constantly.
And, as I've said, sounds of any degree
whatsoever inspire me with terror.

That's why I had to remove my boots.

Yes. And even so, I could hear your coming.
Every footstep, every rustle of your clothes.
I could hear your horse approaching, the
clatter of its hooves across the courtyard,
your knock... The grating of the door bolt
was like a sword stroke to my ears.
I can hear the scratch of rat claws
within the stone wall."

Now as I stand here alone, I weep
Remembering the good old days
I'm cursing the gods who made my family
Fester in such horrible ways

Yet burnt out is the flame of life
Black house falls into smoke
Still on its last faint breath protecting
Secrets of Usher's name

No more left
I beg for death
Its red eye glows
It takes me beyond

‚ô∞ ‚ô∞ ‚ô∞

Title: Trebuchet - Trebuchet  (Full Album 2020)
Description:
Trebuchet (2020)
https://trebuchet2.bandcamp.com/
https://www.facebook.com/trebuchetforce.uk/
Visiting Castle Hedingham in Essex in 2016, gave Dave the idea of what to call his new recording project.
Trebuchet, a huge medieval sling, in which objects are catapulted.
It gave an imagary, perfect for what he was trying to achieve musically. Total chaos!!! Well, not quite, but a nod back to the bands who did their own thing, back when heavy rock was in its infancy.
That's exactly Trebuchet.
Trebuchet
Diss, UK
====
1.
Naseby 00:00
2.
The Devil's Den   10:56
3.
Girl From The Fen      21:04
4.
The Lord Of Doom  28:00
5.
Trebuchet     34:12
====
Originally, this project was going to be a a vehicle for Dave to hone his production skills. However, although that is still true (Dave engineers the whole thing), Trebuchet has become a very important project.
Trebuchet has turned into something completely different as first planned. Not a side project at all, but a full on new project which the guys hope will last forever, as they are having a blast working together.
They, meaning Dave Gilbert (Dark Matter and Minor Planet) and Shayne Joseph (Eldritch Rites).
To cut a long story short, the guys met online and became firm buddies through the power of technology.
It all happened, when Dave was asked to record the vocalists voice, for the debut album by Open Door Of Doom. Australian band Eldritch Rites (Melbourne) supplied the music. Shayne is their guitarist, vocalist and main writer.
Many conversations confirmed Dave and Shayne had so much in common musically and became good friends online.
Dave decided to ask Shayne if he'd like to join him for the ride in Trebuchet. It seemed a no brainer.
====
released February 13, 2020

Dave Gilbert - Rhythm and lead guitars, bass, drums, mellotron, vocals.

Shayne Joseph - Lead and rhythm guitars, backing vocals.

All tracks written by Trebuchet.

Lyrics written by Dave Gilbert.

Mixing and mastering by Dave Gilbert.

Title: Tyranonaut ‚Äì Marble Eye (Full Album 2020)
Description:
Vinyl and Digital Available Here: https://tyranonaut.bandcamp.com/album/marble-eye
Tyranonaut Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialTyranonaut
Tyranonaut Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCALQcF6J9NNMNbgm3hobeEQ
In the Spring of 2017, two brothers began an undertaking that would lead them into complete exile over a period of 2 ¬Ω years.  The sonic vision that became Marble Eye, is the true debut album of Alex and Nick Greywitt of Tyranonaut from Rochester, NY.  Self-financed and self-released under their own label, Hopkins and Stearne Productions, Marble Eye is the amalgamation of the brothers‚Äô ideals of what an album, an invaluable treasure frozen in time, should encapsulate while demanding ‚Äúactive listening,‚Äù as penned by the band. 
*
Witchfinder General, Black Sabbath, Witchfynde, Sensational Alex Harvey Band, Trouble, Pagan Altar, Nazareth, Angel Witch, Jaguar, Satan, Desolation Angels, Hawkwind, Poison (Germany), Jethro Tull, old Genesis, King Crimson, Budgie, Captain Beyond, Black Hole, Celtic Frost, Candlemass/Nemesis, Cloven Hoof, Dream Death/Penance, The Sisters of Mercy and countless others were among utmost importance during this time to create a heavy album with its own sonic identification and concepts. 
*
The Hermetic mindset during this time birthed 5 songs spanning 52 minutes which we are proud to finally release via 666MrDoom‚Äôs channel. A limited edition of 250 vinyl copies are available for pre-order, which the band considers to be the ultimate incarnation and realization of their 3 year vision. The gatefold release will come with a 12‚Äù vinyl, 7‚Äù vinyl, 16x24‚Äù high quality promo poster with full artwork, and double sided insert with extensive liner notes.  The vinyl contains a special mastering completed by Jim Plotkin, differing from the digital master heard here.  
Until then, future eyewitness of those days‚Ä¶a thousand days of yesterday are time since come and gone. Our penance is paid. 
===========================

2. Marble Eye 5:27
3. The Doller House 9:40 
4. Erskine Hollow 20:24

==========================
Released November 14th, 2020

Nick Greywitt ‚Äì Drums, Devices  
*

*
The lyrics to Land of Stagnation are dedicated to Russ Vrankovich and to the memory of Terry Jones of Pagan Altar (1945-2015).
*
The Doller House is dedicated to Brian Lawrence, Mike Smail, Rich Freund, and Terry Weston of Dream Death/Penance. This is an Ode to the Journey and The Road. 
*
Erskine Hollow is dedicated to Phil Cope of Witchfinder General. A life without your music would be impossible. 
*
All music composed and arranged by Tyranonaut. Copyright ¬© Hopkins and Stearne Productions 2020

Title: Karkara - Nowhere Land (Full Album 2020)
Description:
Nowhere Land (2020)
https://www.facebook.com/karkararock/
http://karkara.bandcamp.com/
https://www.karkaraband.com/
KARKARA
Toulouse, France
====
Stolen Body Records
https://stolenbodyrecords.co.uk/
https://www.facebook.com/stolenbodyrecords/
https://www.instagram.com/stolenbodyrecords/
https://twitter.com/Stolenbodyrecs
====
A deafening echo that suddenly speaks out of the dust, conveying all the desolation of an endless landscape up to the sky.
A journey for those who like exotic rock to sound viscerally loud, raw and high gained. To blow up the speakers for good. Fuzzed guitar and Buzzing didgeridoo locked with a sped up drums and cranked bass sound that makes you feel like you are riding a spacecraft at full speed between the dunes.
KARKARA's second album, "Nowhere land" explores the mysteries of the unknown lands. An album that drags the comfort out of your zone and creates an eerie space of atmospheric low-end and sneering highs.
 ----
7 tracks that take a further step into a dark and mystical world.
This album is a straight continuity of 'Crystal Gazer'. The second chapter of a journey made by a traveler who discovers new lands and mysterious people.
Written during Crystal Gazer's tours, among long rides between gigs and rehearsals in south France. Recorded in Toulouse at SwampLand studio and using only analog equipements to add that raw Lo-fi flavor they love.
----
Created in 2017 in Toulouse, France, the threesome takes it's inspiration among different rock genre, from the sweet middle eastern psychedelic rock to the raw shattering sounds of garage fuzz and german krautrock.
Even going so far as to use their favorite atypical instrument - the didgeridoo - the three members of KARKARA, like desert wizards, take pleasure in pushing further the boundaries of the genre and take their audience into a mystical and indomitable world.
----
Their debut album ¬´Crystal Gazer¬ª, released in October 2019 through Stolen Body Records (UK) and the french cassette label Ghost Lizard Diffusion, is a hypnotic musical production inspired by the mystical folklores all around the middle eastern countries. With the collaboration of the illustrator Dead Flag who was an additional source of imagination, this 7 tracks LP of 41 minutes is a deafening psychedelic flood where the desert and the tribal atmosphere is omnipresent. The lyrics take the form of mystical and narrative incantations that draw the thread of an epic journey that unfolds throughout the album. 
----
01. Deliverance 00:00
02. Space Caravan      (5:46
03. Falling Gods    12:10
04. People Of Nowhere land   16:05
05. Setting Sun     22:09
06. Cards    26:23
07. Witch    30:53
----
LINE UP :
Karim Rihani - Guitar , Vocals , Didgeridoo
Hugo Olive - Bass
Maxime Marouani - Drums , Vocals
----
Recording studio : SwampLand ‚Äì Toulouse, France.
Mixing and mastering: LoSpider, Jim Diamond.
Cover artwork : Dead Flag Studios

Title: Oud Masters on Vinyl
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
--
Some of you may remember, I shared a photo on Instagram that teases the idea of making a set dedicated to the oud masters a few months ago. Now it's finally completed! The result doesn't feel nor sound like a usual Coffee Break Sessions episode, that's why I decided not to put CBS in the title.

It's a bit of a risky episode; people might hate it, some might love it, or some wouldn't even feel interested enough to click on it. But regardless, I feel happy with the result and decided to share it:)
Let me know your thoughts:)

Big thanks to my dear friend Mustafa Kaplan for shooting the intro sequence with his oud in his lovely Boston flat.

All Songs Written & Composed by Uri Brauner Kinrot, except Falling, Revolution Eyes & Trip Train - Lyrics by Allan Moon, Space Camel - Lyrics by Kinrot & Dor Koren and Killing Me - Music by Engin Ibrahim

Arranged by Ouzo Bazooka
Recorded, Mixed & Produced by Uri Brauner Kinrot at Eilat Studios

Mastered by Tim Green At Louder Studios, Grass Valley, CA

Artwork by Carlo Vivary

Support this amazing band if you like what you hear!

https://ouzobazooka.bandcamp.com/album/transporter

The undisputed champions of the middle eastern psych rock return with Transporter, their third album to date.

After 2 years trotting the globe and playing over 150 live shows, Ouzo Bazooka returned to the studio a tight knot radiating with ideas and inspiration to create what just might be their most cohesive work to date.

Suspiciously smelling like a mix of prohibited substances and powerful homebrewed potions, Transporter manages to effortlessly be a lot of things, that in a similar universe, contradict each other: it is psychedelic, but accessible. It is adventurous and creatively free spirited, but also filled with anthems waiting to be discovered, like the optimistic but mischievous It‚Äôs A Sin or Space Camel, the perfect soundtrack for your desert soul searching adventure. The sound is recognizable, but simultaneously an exception and expansion of the band‚Äôs creative palette.

Stylistically the album can be weighed for the sum of its parts; it is indebted to the Anatolian psych rock legends of the 70‚Äôs, crossbreeding with surf rock‚Äôs wildest moments and the sounds of the middle eastern ecosystem it sprang up from. But make no mistake, Transporter is its own beast - bursting with untamed creativity, refined songwriting, wild instrumentation and mind-bending, multi-layered production. 
There is a sense of discovery when listening to the album unfold. It channels humid back alleys and smokey dark clubs. Like gaining a backdoor VIP entrance to a forbidden, sweaty fuzz party where vails are removed, vices are tested and secret desires fulfilled. Filled with hidden jewels, the album is fun and surprisingly positive despite the density and weight of its grooves. First and foremost, it is a monument in Ouzo Bazooka‚Äôs sonic journey and an epic new chapter in the band‚Äôs story. 


Bio: 
Ouzo Bazooka was formed in Tel Aviv by Uri Brauner Kinrot, who grew up on the sunny shores of the mediterranean sea and has been active in the music scene for over a decade, shaping the sound of influential local groups as well as the critically acclaimed mediterranean surf band Boom Pam (currently collaborating with Turkish psychedelic-folk legend Selda Baƒücan). 

Tel Aviv‚Äôs cultural diversity served as the perfect backdrop for Ouzo Bazooka‚Äôs formation and the maturing of their style; an exotic blend of middle eastern sounds and scales, moulded together with fuzzed psychedelic surf rock and garage. 

Following the release of their acclaimed self-titled debut album in 2014, the band was embraced by the local crowd and became somewhat of a local phenomena. It was only a matter of time before their sounds reached the European front and after a succession of high profile festival appearances, followed by two stellar releases, the media, critics and the international crowd took notice - the band‚Äôs position as the ambassadors of a new middle eastern rock sound was cemented.

Title: Guest Mix: Greek Folk Records with Psychophono (7" Special)
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#greek #vinylmix
This week's guests are Psychophono. It is a project created by a collective of Italian DJs' based in Milan (Italy), ethnomusicological enthusiasts, who propose vinyl from the 1950s to the early 1980s coming from all tropical parts of the world. Folk and psychedelics from Africa, the Caribbean, South America, the Middle East, and southeast Asia, often contaminated by Western sounds (rock, funk, jazz and soul). 

In this 7" special episode they highlight the various influences that Greek music has had during his history from east to west. You can hear that traditional folk music is full of different rhythms and virtuoso instrument players.

By pooling together inspirations from psychedelic ambient music, eastern/oriental influences, Jazz, Irish and Native American music, we celebrate the coming together of different cultures ‚Äì all drawn to the same path of psychological awakening and enlightenment.

The album art, as well as our logo, was designed by our friend Sponte Sequor / @flowgunart ''

Title: Doomination (Compilation - 2021)
Description:
Doomination (Compilation - 2021)
Fuzzrious, Abraxas and Void team up to present: Doomination.
Compilation focused on Stoner Doom and put together bands from the national and international scene, to compile the main releases of the genre in recent months. The pandemic has opened an unprecedented crisis for artists, composers and all professionals who work directly or indirectly with the music industry.
-
The collections are currently an alternative way to publicize the recent works of artists who have been affected by this situation, when in the absence of live shows, fans can take advantage of the complementary material, to enjoy their favorite bands and meet new ones from the same genre.

Title: Acid Mammoth - Caravan (Full Album 2021)
Description:
GRAB YOUR COPY HERE:https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop.htm#HPS156
USA SHOP:https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop-usa.htm
‚ÄúCaravan‚Äù is the band‚Äôs upcoming third full-length album. It is the direct successor to last year‚Äôs ‚ÄúUnder Acid Hoof‚Äù and the fourth release of the band with Heavy Psych Sounds Records. It was conceived, recorded and produced during a state of total lockdown due to Covid-19, therefore it greatly reflects our mood during these dark times. It is a heavy, sublime and pitch black journey into the vast unknown. Like all of our previous works, ‚ÄúCaravan‚Äù was recorded, mixed and mastered with Dionysis Dimitrakos of Descent Studio in Athens, while drums were recorded at Ignite Studio. The artwork was once again crafted by Branca Studio. It is a witchy album for witchy ears, a heavy opus that has emerged straight from the deepest abyss. 
Once again the father and son duo on guitars offer the listener a horde of crushing, fuzzy, Iommi riffs while the mammoth bass tears down everything in its path with its acid hooves. Its drums are thundering unearthly beats of harrowing doom while its mesmerizing vocals will bewitch you with their words of woe. Heavier and more diverse than its predecessor, ‚ÄúCaravan‚Äù is here to tear you down with its acid tusks. Prepare to be doomed!!!
====
Acid Mammoth Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/acidmammoth

Title: 1782 - FromThe Graveyard (Full Album 2021)
Description:
GRAB YOUR COPY: https://www.heavypsychsounds.com 
USA SHOP: https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop-usa.htm 
"From The Graveyard" is the second full length of the Occult Doom band "1782". In this album there is a leap in quality as the production is much better than the previous releases.
Eight tracks and 43 minutes of pure dark Doom, with slow and powerful riffs, and heavy and massive drumming.
After the recording of "Doom Sessions Vol.2", the band immediately enters the studio and records the heaviest tracks they have done so far, and they have done it while maintaining that catchy state they have always had. Here too there are featurings, Nico Sechi on organ (Hammond in "1782" and "Celestial Voices" in the debut album) and Alfredo Carboni's Synth.
As in the eponymous debut album, the artwork was done by the mighty SSCVLT.
"From The Graveyard" was recorded, mixed and mastered in November 2020 by Alfredo Carboni at "RKS Studios" in Ossi, Sardinia (Italy).
====
1782 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1782doom
====

Title: ùë´ùíêùíëùíÜ ùë∑ùíñùíìùíëùíçùíÜ "ùëÆùíìùíÇùíïùíÜùíáùíñùíç ùë¨ùíèùíÖ" ùíÄùíÜùíçùíçùíêùíò ùëΩùíäùíèùíöùíç
Description:
Dope Purple "Grateful End" 
Yellow Vinyl 
Stoner Doom Noise Experimental


 Tracklist


A1  ÊàëÁöÑÈÇ™ÊÉ° My Evilness  00:36
A2  Cosmic Rock Is Not Dead  07:37
B1  ‰∫∫È°ûÊúÄÂæåÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂ§©/ ÁîúÁæéÁöÑÂ§úÊôöÔºåÁîúÁæéÁöÑÊ≠ª‰∫° The Last Day of Humanity / Good Night and Good Death  17:56
B2  New Man  28:33


Dope Purple Grateful End is a far out psychedelic heavy space rock album in the vain of Acid Mothers Temple with wild experimental guitars, feedback, sci-fi synth sounds and explosive energy. This is a cosmic rocket ship that blast through the stars and lands on barren extraterrestrial landscapes. The guitars are forward in the mix and the drummer ramps up to light speed building incredible intensity and drive in the climatic sections of the album. Most of the songs run around 10 minutes in length for full freakout rock styling. Dope Purple Grateful End has echoing vocals that are literally buried in echo and reverb making them near indistinguishable. It adds to the psyched out atmosphere of the album and gives it an underground feel.
Dope Purple is from Taiwan and Grateful End is their first vinyl release. This album was first released in 2019 on cassette and CD. This new vinyl version has received a full remaster and sounds bigger and badder than ever. 


FULL REVIEW : https://thepsychrock.com/2021/04/15/dope-purple-grateful-end-cosmic-freak-out-acid-rock/

Title: Arabic Grooves with Shaqdi
Description:
#arabic #vinylset
Welcome to the second season of the Coffee Break Sessions! This is the fifth episode where me and Shaqdi playing records from Tunisia, Algeria, Lebanon, Egypt, Morocco, Libya.

Shaqdi is an artist, producer and songwriter based in London. She's half Swedish and half Palestinian and in this set she's playing some records from her dad's own collection.

Title: Jack Harlon & The Dead Crows - Rat Poisoning (Single 2021)
Description:
'Rat Poisoning' is the first single off the long-awaited second album from Jack Harlon & The Dead Crows, 'The Magnetic Ridge'. It's a six-and-a-half-minute jam-track about living and feeling like a rat, while trying to create something beautiful.

'The Magnetic Ridge' will be released on vinyl through Psychedelic Salad Records and cassette/CD via Forbidden Place Records on Monday 17th May, with pre-sales kicking off on Monday 10th May.

Jack Harlon & The Dead Crows

LYRICS:
As the light creeps in the hall
And the dust mites wait to feed
The old black rat designs his palace
Nestled in amongst the filth
He gathers junk and useless things
Never straying from the deadline
With winter's clutch prolonged and death 'round the corner
The old black rat heals from the poison of disorder

Well I found a rat and cornered it
Yeah he was hiding in the shadows of my mind
And I felt the cold of winter on his back
And nothin' but sun light shining down upon his head

Title: '70s Indonesian Psych, Funk & Disco with Westside MuzeeQ
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#vinylmix #indonesia
This week‚Äôs guest is Andhika Gautama aka Westside MuzeeQ from Bali, Indonesia. He is an avid music collector since the tender age of 8 years old. He is currently a resident vinyl DJ at many top venues on the Island of Bali, Indonesia. 

He created Westside MuzeeQ as a hub in the form of a record store, as well as his DJ alias. He performs live with his records in Indonesia, Australia, South East Asia and Europe. He also produces the bi-yearly event Record & Cassette Store Day Bali.

For the past few years, he is determined to bring the lost hidden gems of the '60s & '70s Indonesian Psychedelic Funk, Soul & Disco Music to the publics' ears. 

In this set Westside MuzeeQ spins 45 minutes of rare Grooves that have not been reissued or released on any formats other than the original vinyl source from the '70s.

Title: Forsaken :Visions In Thy Shadow
Description:
Tales of Doom and Woe 2010 I Hate Records
Doom Metal (Malta)
https://ihate.bandcamp.com/album/tales-of-doom-and-woe
ùêìùêöùê•ùêûùê¨ ùê®ùêü ùêÉùê®ùê®ùê¶ ùêöùêßùêù ùêñùê®ùêû: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCuG7EbGbbw

I see through your eyes
Incarnation of insanity
A paralysis of human emotion
Realms of irreversality

An ethereal animation
Beyond the source of pain
Through cessation of life
Drowned in rivers of shame

A venture for redemption that dies in vain
Cries of ovation unleash your blame

You consummate an oath of misery
The path stretched by the fortitude of indignity
Now the penance for your guilt will show
Through the visions in thy shadow

Leave me... Deceive me

You lie naked persecuted
Beyond the scythe of death
Extreme unction, the beacon for your last breath
No sacred light to contour your way
The hollowness of faith fills the recesses of your prayer

A venture for redemption that dies in vain
Cries of ovation unleash your blame

A congregation bereaves the concealed answer
Prophecies on your corpse at the temple's altar
A burnt offering, a vestige that smoulders in haste
Through astral skies your soul still begs to elucidate

Bandcamp: https://lowen.bandcamp.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Lowenband/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowen_band/
Crushing progressive doom steeped in the history of the ancient middle-east and the empty vistas of space.
Lowen is Nina Saeidi and Shem Lucas
Lowen
London, UK
====
1.
The Exalted One Who Walketh 00:00
2.
Against Evil Done By The Serpent      10:13
3.
Lalae Madar       19:13
====
A limited run of hand numbered cassettes and CDs will be available for pre-sale on here from Friday May 7th.

This album was recorded live by Jackhammer Promotions at the Green Door Store in Brighton as part of the Doomsday Online live stream series to raise money for the venue.

The first two tracks are fully improvised.

The Exalted One Who Walketh is sung in Sumerian, with lyrics being arranged from the tablet "E-lum Didara" by Nina.

Against Evil Done by the Serpent is sung in Akkadian and taken from Elizabeth Payne's transliteration of tablet YBC11381.

Lalae Madar is an Iranian lullaby sung in Farsi.
====
releases June 4, 2021

Vocals, daf and shruti box by Nina Saeidi

Guitar by Shem Lucas

Mastering by Magnus Lindberg

This would not have been possible without Dinko, Doomsday Fest and South Coast Extreme Metal

=
Heliosphere is a Canadian metal band based in Edmonton, Alberta. Formed in 2019, they began writing material almost immediately, taking advantage of the members‚Äô varied musical backgrounds. They merge influences from 70s classic rock to contemporary metal to create a unique sonic brew, incorporating everything from cosmic, planet-hopping riffs inspired by the low ‚Äòn slow doom greats to the soaring and driving vocals of the golden age of rock ‚Äòn roll. In their debut single, Godhead, they combine these influences to great effect, resulting in a heavy-hitting juggernaut of a track sure to command the attention of the listener

Title: Achachak - High Mountain (Full Album 2021)
Description:
Achachak is back with a brand new album! This time they are delivering 10 new & fresh tunes. Recorded and produced by brother Lem, at Cave Studio in Sinj; Croatia.
‚ÄúHigh Mountain‚Äù has a monolithic force gluing guitars, drums and
bass all together to give the listener a punch in the face with a bag of weed and desert sand!
This album gets its high power from mixing together a 4x12 Orange amps with a doom-metal and stoner rock sound in a transcendental way. We can count a bunch of singles, such as ‚ÄúMr. SM‚Äù and
‚ÄúLesson‚Äù, as well as a couple of fuzzodelic-doomy songs like
‚ÄúCaptain Morning‚Äù and ‚ÄúLonewolf‚Äù and also more radio (un)friendly tunes like ‚ÄúCozy Night‚Äù and ‚ÄúMaui Waui‚Äù.
This is the 2nd album of the band and we believe the best one so far.
This devilish baby is released by Dostava Zvuka Records.
The amazing artwork, made by the one and only Ivan Lampalov, thank you brother for drawing the scene we watch every morning.
=====
GRAB YOUR COPY: https://band.link/JxvXj

Title: Latin Influenced South East Asia with Norsicaa
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#vinylmix #latin #southeastasia

Norsicaa is playing South East Asian records that have a Latin music influence. What's more exciting is that she specially remastered and cut several records that she had which had surface noise and she felt deserved new life. After remastering, Norsicaa hand-cut 2 acetate dubplates using an analog Neumann VMS 70 vinyl cutting lathe!

Norsicaa's eclectic repertoire dates back to a musical upbringing. While versed in several music instruments, she eventually found DJing a satisfying outlet for her far-reaching taste - further expanded through working at Sounds of the Universe record store in Soho. Aside from Norsicaa's 4-weekly show on Soho Radio, she has contributed mixes to Stamp The Wax and Phonica Records, The Vinyl Factory and more. In summer 2019 she performed live on Boiler Room, supporting KOKOKO!. Amongst all this, she also runs daily operations as general manager for the respected independent record label, Soundway Records.
------------
Our Silver and Gold Tier supporters get uninterrupted, uncut, ad-free, high-quality audio of all mixes.
To support this channel, you can visit our Patreon page and make a small donation!
https://www.patreon.com/myanalogjournal

ULTRA is the US psych-fuzz band Kadabra debut album.
GRAB YOUR COPY HERE: https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop.htm#HPS178
USA PRESALE:https://www.heavypsychsounds.com/shop-usa.htm 
=
Written throughout the 2020 global pandemic, Kadabra‚Äôs debut album ‚ÄúUltra‚Äù presents an aesthetic that nears that ‚Äúclassic rock‚Äù charm and energy. The group has meshed together the droned flow of psychedelic clamor with an abrasive fuzzed riff drive. The sound is a mixture of psychedelic rock and hard rock riffing, vocals are choral and magnetic. In the fall of 2020, KADABRA enter the studio to record ‚ÄúUltra‚Äù with producer Dawson Scholz : 7 brand new tracks for a fresh debut album: ULTRA keep the listener awake until the last minute of the album, with a variety of chill atmospheres. You can listen strong influences of Dead Meadow, Pentagram. One of the best albums in this 2021 so far !!

Title: Records from Lebanon with Ernesto Chahoud
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#vinylmix #lebanon #middleeast

Ernesto Chahoud is a DJ, compiler, music researcher and radio host, with monthly shows on NTS, Totally Wired and Radio Alhara. He co-founded the Beirut Groove Collective, a decade-old vinyl DJ collective that runs one of Beirut‚Äôs hippest weekly parties, the BGC All-Nighter, where obscure 1960s and 1970s clubbing records from around the world can be heard. A serious record collector, Chahoud has one of the largest vinyl collections in the Middle East. Specializing in Arabic and Ethiopian music, his taste for little-known gems and obscure dancefloor stompers for his DJ box has taken him on digging trips around the world, from Addis Ababa to Cairo.

In this special guest mix, he's playing some of the rarest records from Lebanon.

Make sure to check out the compilation album with the tracks from Ethiopia‚Äôs seventies music scene, via BBE. Taitu: Soul-fuelled stompers from 1970s Ethiopia includes 25 tracks spanning r&b, rock, jazz, funk, and soul. The album which is divided into two parts ‚Äì ‚ÄúEthiopian soul clappers‚Äù and ‚ÄúEthiopian soul stompers‚Äù ‚Äì features well-known musicians, like ‚Äúgodfather of Ethio jazz‚Äù Mulatu Astatke and ‚ÄúEthiopian Elvis‚Äù Alemayehu Eshete, alongside lesser-known artists.

https://www.discogs.com/Ernesto-Chahoud-Taitu-Soul-Fuelled-Stompers-From-1960s-1970s-Ethiopia/master/1316472

Title: Saz Beats: Organic Turkish Anatolian Grooves
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#vinylmix #turkishfolk #turkishfunk

The saz or baƒülama is a family of plucked string instruments, long-necked lutes used in Ottoman classical music, Turkish folk music, Turkish Arabesque music, Azerbaijani music, Kurdish music, Armenian music and in parts of Syria, Iraq and the Balkan countries. In this mix where I explored raw and organic sounds of Turkey from the late '60s till the end of the '70s, besides baglama, you'll also hear instruments like kanun and oud.

For their eagerly anticipated follow up, Morieris, North Carolina duo Crystal Spiders bassist Brenna Leath (Lightning Born, The Hell No) and drummer Tradd Yancey (Doomsday Profit) take a lead guitar assist from Mike Dean (Corrosion of Conformity bassist and Leath‚Äôs bandmate in Ripple labelmates Lightning Born) for a rollercoaster ride of doomy atmospherics, razor sharp riffs, and infectious rhythms.

With their second offering, the band builds upon and refines the whiplash intensity of Molt to experiment with intricate harmonies, thundering breakdowns, and orchestral instrumentals (including guest cello from High Priestess Nighthawk of Heavy Temple). 2020 saw Crystal Spiders‚Äô debut seated on many Album of the Year charts, and with Morieris, there‚Äôs no doubt that heavy music lovers will be saving a spot for them at the end of 2021 as well.
====
released October 1, 2021

Only a year after recording their three-song demo and debuting live to a hometown crowd in Raleigh, the new band helmed by bassist Brenna Leath (Lightning Born) and drummer Tradd Yancey present their first riff-worshipping full-length, Molt. Pulling from classic rock dynamics and punk intensity, psychedelic textures and bluesy swing, this is a band hewn from the same granite as contemporaries like Heavy Temple and The Well, who build upon well-trod post-Sabbath templates to blaze their own path. With forthcoming appearances at Raleigh Deathfest and Maryland Doom Fest, it‚Äôs a safe bet that Crystal Spiders will soon demand the attention of the fuzz-addicted legions far and wide.
