Title: Songs that will Cure Your Hangover with Ceylan G√∂ksel
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#majandfriends #vinylmix #chill 

MAJ producer, music supervisor, Netil Radio and Resonance Extra resident, former Worldwide FM crew, and an all-around music person Ceylan G√∂ksel steps in to ease you into the new year with her selections.

Ceylan listens, lives and enjoys all things music, but when it comes to home listening and soundtracking her daily life, she has a soft spot for chill-out, trip-hop, downtempo, ambient, contemporary classical and electronic music. In this episode, Ceylan shares her favorites to cure your hangover, ease you into the new year and remind you that ‚Äúlife goes on‚Äù.

Title: The Doomsday Kingdom: Never Machine Demo EP
Description:
Never Machine Demo 2016
Doom Metal/Leif Edling (Candlemass)
Stockholm, Sweden

I. Never Machine 00:00
II. The Sceptre 06:16  
III. Zodiac City 13:11
IV. The Whispering 19:27

NEVER MACHINE

Rain and fire, thunder sky... vortex drifting
Hidden deep in the holes of time
Reality's shifting
Close your eyes for the machine
Hell construction
Will come and take your inner dreams
Into the nothing

The machine is ancient, black and old
Doomsday tool
Got no feelings, the heart is cold
In the hands of fools
From the future, from the past, eons of crumbling
It will blow your mind to Kingdom Come
Void is rumbling

Never machine
The never machine
You stare into the emptiness
Never machine
The never machine
Erasing all the yesterdays

Evil thing... you'll eat the light inside my soul
Life's forgotten
It leaves no shadow, leaves no hope
Black machine... box of smoke and sorrow
Press the button
And your dreams are swallowed whole

THE SCEPTRE

Their war was without no end
A thousand hundred dark dreams
The Red Queen and the Black (the Swan)
Sisters... enemies

The Red and the Black Queens at war
From dawn to dusk and over again
For the Crown, the Kingdom, a Throne
For the Sceptre and the Power

Through the garden and the willow trees
The Red Queen rides on her rat
With armor and sword in hand
The spear of fate on her back

A sceptre for a queen

The Red Queen, the warrior, the brave
Charged forward on her rat
The Black Swan, furious with rage
Spread her wings for attack

She drowned her sister with fire
And the Red one put the sword in her twin
The Sceptre was lost in the battle
Now let the war begin

In the ruins of the castle walls
The swans saw the new day sun
And the Black Swan with the crown on her head
Rose from the Ivory Throne

A sceptre for a queen
Deception and deceit
Here comes the queen
The sceptre for a queen
There's evil in this dream

"Fans of Elder, OM or Colour Haze can‚Äôt miss out on Pelegrin. Mind-expanding stoner rock that will send you on an epic journey!

‚ÄúThis is ethereal rock with a clear Middle Eastern influence in its DNA with poignant and captivating themes [...] ‚ÄúWays of Avicenna‚Äù is a record that demands respect and adoration from the scene‚Äù - Headbanger Reviews (USA)

"There is a tangible magic to Ways Of Avicenna that can‚Äôt possibly be described with words; the album is an incredibly emotive musical and conceptual journey that has to be experienced without interruption. Wonderfully immersive and excellently crafted, Pelegrin have produced a truly beautiful work of art here." - Distorted Soung Mag (USA)

"The end result is an album that's a joy to listen to for dynamics, movement, and momentum, and also one which you can let your mind wander to. [...] In short, it's yet another phenomenal stoner album from France, a true joy for us here in the beginning of the year." - Heavy Blog Is Heavy (USA)"

Title: Records from Pakistan, Bangladesh and India with Haseeb Iqbal
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
#majandfriends #vinylmix #india  
------------
Build a beautiful website with Squarespace and save 10% when you use our link: https://squarespace.com/maj
------------
Haseeb Iqbal is a DJ, broadcaster and writer from London. Formerly on Worldwide FM, he has recently launched his own independent radio station Haseeb Iqbal . World, where he shares stories, sounds and conversations about the culture. He curates an array of events, from his monthly vinyl Studio Crumb club nights to the fortnightly Chessidency evenings, listening sessions and more! 

"On this episode, Haseeb plays records from Pakistan, India and Bangladesh, stitching together the sounds of three countries who were all one before the British Colonial partition of 1947. He uses the music to celebrate their common ground, rooted in the same culture and land."

Title: Acid King - Beyond Vision (Full Album 2023)
Description:
Available on LP / CD / Cassette from Blues Funeral Recordings at:https://bluesfuneral.com
Or:https://bluesfuneralrecordings.bandcamp.com Or:https://en.bluesfuneral.spkr.media
Beyond Vision began as an experiment and became the path to a silver future, marking the
dawn of a new era for a band that historically relied almost exclusively on thundering riffage.
Recorded by longtime producer Billy Anderson, the album's songs flow into each other without
beginning or ending, propelled by an undulating, lysergic pulse that takes listeners wherever
they'd like to go. One might even call it a concept record, with themes that contemplate
interplanetary migration, the winding path of existence, and how we expect this trip to go one
way, only to find it taking directions we never imagined. Don't get it twisted, though: there are
blistering guitars and swirling power dirges aplenty. Beyond Vision is undeniably Acid King, now
in widescreen technicolor and interstellar cinemascope.
-
http://www.acidking.com/
https://www.facebook.com/AcidkingSF
https://www.instagram.com/acidkingrocks/
https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/acid-king/id6970454
Acid King are heavy rock royalty, creators of some of the most monolithic riffs and heaviest tones ever known. At long last, they return with Beyond Vision, their first new album since 2015's Middle Of Nowhere, Center of Everywhere.

With blistering guitars and swirling power dirges aplenty, Beyond Vision began as an experiment and became the path to a silver future. Recorded by longtime producer Billy Anderson, the songs flow into each other without beginning or ending, propelled by an undulating, lysergic pulse that takes listeners wherever they'd like to go.

Tracing the winding path of interplanetary existence, Beyond Vision is a monumental return, and begins a new era for the band who built the template for thundering, swinging, trip-inducing doom.

https://www.tiktok.com/@wyndrider?_t=8Xgo8Ej8vxm&_r=1
https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/wyndrider/pit-witch
WyndRider is a four-piece #Stoner #Doom band from the mountains of East Tennessee. with their first show played in March of 2022. The debut self-titled album, WyndRider, was recorded in late September of the same year by Danielle Fehr from The Wizard Productions. The recordings are the most raw, natural sounding form of the songs that the band was able to capture in a studio setting, while still emulating the energy of a live performance. Bands such as Black Sabbath, Steppenwolf, and Budgie inspired their take on a continuation of heavy and psychedelic music. The themes of this album are a culmination of subjects such as apocalypse, alien life, the Satanic Panic, and sarcastic dissection of the Christian Church. It portrays a new version of the physical, biting addictiveness that Rock and Roll inspired for another generation.

Title: North African Ra√Ø Tapes and Records with Cheb Mimo
Description:
#vinylmix #majandfriends #ra√Ø
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
------------
Cheb Mimo is a versatile artist whose eclectic taste in music has been influenced by his global upbringing. With roots in Algeria and Tunisia, having lived in France and Mexico, and currently is based in London, he has been collecting music records and cassettes from all corners of the world since a young age. Throughout his extensive exploration of various musical genres, Cheb Mimo has developed an even deeper appreciation for his roots and his rich North African cultural heritage. His love for Ra√Ø music is evident in his radio shows, club nights, and publications, where he enthusiastically shares its unique sounds and rhythms with a wider audience. Cheb Mimo, ‚ÄúCheb‚Äù (meaning ‚Äúyoung‚Äù) in homage to notable Ra√Ø musicians, is also the co-founder and resident DJ of ‚ÄúRa√Ø-naissance,‚Äù a club night in his hometown Tunis that is quickly becoming a crowd favorite.

‚ÄúBeing Algerian and Tunisian, Ra√Ø has always been a part of my life. It has accompanied all of my family gatherings and parties with friends throughout my childhood, teenage and young adult years. It is my utmost priority to share this slice of my cultural heritage with the rest of the world, and in curating this episode, I have endeavored to showcase this rich genre in its most authentic form. From the iconic trumpet of Messaoud Bellemou to the inimitable voice of Cheb Khaled, every track has been chosen to represent the essence of Ra√Ø and foster greater appreciation and understanding of this beautiful and unique genre.‚Äù

''Clamor Luciferi‚Äù means the scream of Lucifer, a hostile scream but it also means noise and uproar!  1782 with this latest work have taken out the most powerful and evil songs they have ever made.  The album opens with an organ piece that conveys anxiety, suffering and melancholy.  From the second track onwards the heavy and fuzzy riffs start, followed by a powerful and hypnotic drums.  As always, the themes are occult and legends of their land.  An album that will drag you into the deepest and most deafening darkness, let yourself go and be hypnotized by the Clamor Luciferi!

Title: Mars Red Sky - Mars Red Sky & Queen Of The Meadow (2023) [Full EP]
Description:
Tracklist:
00:00 - Maps Of Inferno
07:17 - Out At Large
12:57 - Maps Of Inferno (shortcut)

Notes:
"When the power of psychedelic heavy meets the depth of dark folk harmonies, it results in a complex and exhilarating flavor. The daring combination opens up the genres to a whole new dimension. MARS RED SKY's new EP, soberly entitled "Mars Red Sky & Queen Of The Meadow", exalts and enhances the trio's magic formula: namely, the blend of a robust and determined rhythm section with jagged and ambitious vocals, all evolving within a unique soundscape. The two tracks of the record suggest a disturbing journey through an immense maze directly inspired by mad architect Piranesi and his towers with terrifying staircases. Real melodic narrative, Queen Of The Meadow's vocals carve out an unexpected intensity. Mars Red Sky offers here an abyssal production, polished and unheard of."

Credits:
Helen Ferguson - lead vocals and melodies
Julien Pras - guitars, back-up vocals
Jimmy Kinast - bass
Matgaz - drums

All songs composed, written and arranged by Mars Red Sky and Queen Of The Meadow.

Produced, recorded and mixed by Benjamin Mandeau at Cryog√®ne Studio, B√®gles (France).
Mastering by Ladislav Agabekov at Caduceus Studios, Gimel (Switzerland).
Band photography by Jessica Calvo (photography), Fluor_99 (artwork).
Cover by Machado Le√£o (artwork), Brett Kielick (photography).
Layout by Floriane Fontaine.

viciouscircle.fr - mrsredsound.com

Support the artist if you like what you hear!

Title: Lord Vicar: Signs of Osiris
Description:
Signs of Osiris The Church Within Records
Finnish Doom Metal
https://lordvicar.bandcamp.com/album/signs-of-osiris
Fear No Pain: https://youtu.be/MF6ODJTfjSo
The Fear of Being Crushed: https://youtu.be/0SUnuD5CXCA
The Demon of Freedom: https://youtu.be/meXKxkMx914
The Black Powder: https://youtu.be/umeL0nepssA
Gates of Flesh: https://youtu.be/7TlZlhXmwrI

I. Sign of Osiris Slain 00:00
II. The Answer 06:27
III. Child Witness 10:43
IV. Between the Blue Temple and the North Tower 20:04
V. Sinking City 29:37
VI. Endless November 36:19
VII. Sign of Osiris Risen 43:26


Sign of Osiris Slain

We are a legion, have brought you down, forever
Salt and burning sulphur will cover your land
War is our religion, our destiny to conquer
We dream about the heat and endless sand

You have been the guiding light,
the rhythm of the river,
a keeper of the beat in the hearts of the brave
All light has been extinguished now,
your armour stripped and ruined
Within an empire fallen,
a ritual grave

Everywhere you look these days,
You see more death and fear
Faceless soldiers marching in despair
Following the ancient way
the rhythm lord was taken
and torn in five directions, flesh laid bare

See his lonely trip through time
See him chained to crippling fear
And though the world now must be blind:
The Judgment day is drawing near!


The Answer

The skies light up the night
In shades of burning fire
Leave me with no place to hide
The naked truth it makes me blind

Life is just like a battlefield
Next day is just like the other
I‚Äôm locked inside a darkened world
Loss and pain always on my mind

I need to find the answer
There‚Äôs nothing left for me
Forever trying to find a way out
It was never meant to be this way

There was never any hope for us
Since we began this struggle
So we will show no fear
Death is always on our side

Our lives are hanging by a thread
Knowing each breath could be the last
Mothers they will cry in fear and sorrow
When they see what we have become

You will never find the answer
Unless you search within your soul
The fire that devours you must burn out
Ashes of doubt now turn to dust


Endless November

If you had been to those places
And seen all the things I have seen
Then would you still dream of perfection?
And what kind of life it would mean?
I have returned to the living
From the land of the lost
But I can still feel the same longing
I felt when I travelled that land

Rain falls on me
Making me feel like I‚Äôm alive
Endless rivers,
Their streams are still drowning my eyes
Did you have to surrender to our sorrow?
Did you have to abandon our way?
Pressures are revealing secrets of the soul
And only the humble remain

Like a leaf that has lost all direction
Cast aside by the cold Autumn wind
I stare at the endless horizon,
And try to forget where I have been
Too proud to beg your forgiveness
I still whisper your name
Too late to admit I‚Äôm still sinking
I measure the cost of my shame


Sign of Osiris Risen

Collecting pieces of what once was me, she joins them silently by hand
She works her way on the familiar figure, I feel the pressure, an urge to see

Extreme heat inside the coffin home, carried through the dying land
I know my son because I swallowed his eye; this was the moment, my mind set free:

Lord of Love, Lord of Silence, Lord of the Dead. A process of imitation,
return of vegetation through the flood. His backbone and His river, a Sacred Ram kept in His memory. The Soul of the Lord, of the pillar of Stability. His genitals divided, worshipped His will, His fertility. Gloomy, solemn, mournful actions for the rebirth of the grain. Sister in the sorrow, sharing His Kingdom with the Dead. If wheat and clay were transformed, He will always be the Perfect One.

This was all revealed to me in the movements of a ritual
Hooded figures guiding me through the moments of despair
Witnessing the sign of silence, I understand the union:
Between man and a woman there‚Äôs a return

Nail by nail and bone to bone, he is to be complete again
Like a beast he is reborn: On his feet and near perfection
Blood is rushing through his veins, his heart now beats with pain
Shivering, this deadly form, he dreams with open eyes

Hand in hand we rise and pray for those who came before us
We will let our love burn and our slaves will lose their sight
Resurrecting heavens vast we reflect the light that once was
Horrid is the might we bear as we strike back the night

Hope that you can hear the same strong and brave voice that I heard
The order of the guiding signs remains the same ...just like above
All I said throughout the night ...I did mean every word
Can you share this mystery with me, my only true love?

üïà üïà üïà

Title: Psychedelic & Folk Music from Brittany with L√©na C
Description:
#vinylmix #majandfriends #bretagne 
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music.
------------
The 70s and early 80s Psychedelic, Prog Rock & Folk music from Brittany (Bretagne, France) 
L√©na C. is a Manchester/West Yorkshire based DJ and producer born and bred in Brittany, France.
She has made a name for herself playing cross-genre sets in and around Manchester, where she started DJing in 2017.
Whether it be in her own compositions or in her mixes, L√©na exudes her eclectic influences mixing modern with vintage electronic and traditional sounds from all around the world.

In this mix, L√©na is paying homage to her roots by playing a selection of records from Brittany, which is situated in the northwest of France. Usually known for its strong traditional Celtic music scene, L√©na decided to shine a light on the psychedelic and proggy side of Breton music which isn‚Äôt the most well-known and traditional one but yet still very much Breton.
------------

Title: Wizard Tattoo - Wizard Tattoo (EP 2022)
Description:
Wizard Tattoo (EP 2022)
https://wizardtattoo.bandcamp.com/
https://facebook.com/wizardtattooband
https://instagram.com/wizardtattooband
https://twitter.com/thewizardtattoo
wizardtattooband.com/
Wizard Tattoo is an Indianapolis based rock band by multi-instrumentalist Bram the Bard that
summons catchy riffs with progressive and heavy elements. Wizard Tattoo is the self-titled debut
concept EP which tells the story of a man who starts hearing a dark voice shortly after getting a
tattoo. Throughout the four tracks, listen to his musical journey of delusion
====
1.
Wizard Tattoo 00:00
2.
A Wizard's Lie     05:50
3.
Wizard Knife Fight (At a Bar)    10:47
4.
No Return    15:36
====
Wizard Tattoo is the self-titled debut concept EP from Indianapolis multi instrumentalist Bram the Bard. It tells the story of a man who starts hearing a dark voice shortly after getting a tattoo. Throughout the four tracks, listen to his musical journey of delusion. Is he really becoming a wizard or is he just going mad?

"If Wizard Tattoo keeps releasing great records such as this then the Doom/Stoner Metal Underground scene are going to love this band like I do already." - Outlaws of the Sun

"Another band with true grit at the Crossroads of America." "Trust me, you'll be entertained." - Doomed & Stoned

"Dirty, groove and doom with all manner of fuzz and distortion sticking to the riffs like glue. It‚Äôs a very imaginative track that culminates in something quite filthy sounding." - Games, Brrraaains & A Head-Banging Life

"Outstanding: The whole thing, the various composition/characteristics, moods/atmosphere. Especially the last track, 'No Return' -just mesmerizing, powerful, and magical about the piece -draws the listener in." - Metal 1on1

"This is a worthy listen, and I would be down to check out what comes next. 7/10" - Musipedia of Metal
====
released August 26, 2022

All music by Bram the Bard

Mixed and Mastered at Garage Fire Recordings, Indianapolis, IN

Album artwork by Zi F. Tam

Title: Eclectic Cinematic Cuts with Avi Del Mono
Description:
All music rights belong to their rightful owners. Please support the musicians and buy their music. 
------------
COMPETITION
What would you name the movie?
Listen, imagine the scenes and comment below; the best 2 titles will each get a record sent to them from Avi‚Äôs personal collection, anywhere in the world.

"Whether it's for the headphones or the dancefloor, I always map out sets with a beginning, middle and end, taking listeners on a journey.  I've been obsessed with tracks that evoke emotion with a cinematic feel, so this represents a small cross section of my record collection with music from 1968 right through to present day in 2023."

Born & raised in Malaga, Avi Del Mono now lives in Lisbon after 20 years of being immersed in London's music scene.  He was the General Manager for Boiler Room and hosted his radio show "Hear No Evil" on NTS & Run Dem Radio, whilst photographing some of the city's important music events.  Avi's range of influences has made his sets a landing spot for soul, hip-hop, dub, UKG and everything in between.

Title: Space Shepherds - What Fabric ? (Full Album 2023)
Description:
What Fabric? (2023)
Bandcamp: https://spaceshepherds.bandcamp.com/album/what-fabric
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spaceshepherds/?hl=en-gb
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpaceShepherds
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/0XstviEoSC9nKuyJE2U8Ar?si=7QVzCXG4RiWJbyeoH0SV4g
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqR2HRUIcj9vgIJ2Se5vHvA
Space Shepherds came about through a mutual love of fast-paced kraut-rock, shoe-gaze, and heavy hitting doom riffs. Formed in Belfast, Ireland in 2017 by David Malone and Gareth Hill, the duo have spent years honing their craft in order to provide trance-inducing music and electric live shows. As the duo have progressed, so has the makeup of Space Shepherds which has come to include a wider range of instruments and players. With the core guitar and drums being supplied by Gareth and David, the music has grown to also incorporate bass, synths, more guitars, percussion sections, flutes and world instruments such as didgeridoos. The drop-in-drop-out element of the band ensures that no two improvisational jams are the same and this does much to keep it fresh and exciting.
====

Glint 00:00
2.
Come Unstuck    13:36
3.
Who Knows   29:42
4.
Strangements   56:46

(IG: thomasdundas.art)

Jams by Gareth Hill, David Malone, Dave Siggins, Peter Hunter, Maeve Mulholland, & Chris Stark

Thank you all for the support! Much love!
Long live the jams!

Title: Moon Coven - Sun King (Full Album 2023)
Description:
Buy here:https://ripplemusic.bandcamp.com/album/sun-king
Occult-tinged stoner doom from Sweden, Moon Coven just keep going from strength to strength. Their last album for Ripple, Slumber Wood was described by The Sleeping Shaman as "totally blown away by the avalanche of awesome stoner-doom riffage contained therein. It‚Äôs unusual to come across an album in such a crowded genre that sounds completely fresh and delivers such quality tunes from start to finish." And the band simply ups the ante on this, their third album.

Pressed on very limited edition milky clear and black galaxy vinyl.
====
https://www.facebook.com/mooncoven
Moon Coven are a Swedish stoner rock band whose deep understanding of the classics and their passion for fuzz make for a distinct and potent sound.

Title: ùìíùì∏ùìªùìπùì∏-ùìúùìÆùì∑ùìΩùìÆ - ùìíùì∏ùìªùìπùì∏-ùìúùìÆùì∑ùìΩùìÆ
Description:
Corpo-Mente

Vinyl Ritual     00:00
A1  Scylla 00:37
A2  Arsalein 04:58
A3  Fia 09:05
B1  Velandi 13:39
B2  Dorma 17:11
C1  Dulcin 23:39

Si vous me permettez une petite digression, j'aimerais vous pr√©senter aujourd'hui l'un des albums que j'attendais le plus de cette ann√©e : Corpo Mente, par le groupe du m√™me nom. Si vous vous int√©ressez √† l'extr√™me sous toutes ses formes et que vous n'√™tes pas ferm√©s aux musiques √©lectroniques, il n'est pas impossible que vous ayez d√©j√† crois√© le chemin de Gautier Serre, la t√™te pensante du projet Igorrr, mais aussi l'auteur des p√©rip√©ties cyber-grindcore Whourkr. Et c'est accompagn√© de Laure Le Prunenec qu'il nous propose aujourd'hui une ≈ìuvre beaucoup plus intime, r√©sultat d'un travail effectu√© dans l'ombre de leurs projets respectifs (Laure Le Prunenec chante dans √ñxx√∂ X√∂√∂x, mais aussi chez Igorrr). Corpo Mente, c'est donc le projet folk, baroque, trip-hop, que sais-je encore, de deux g√©nies de la musique marqu√©s par une personnalit√© tr√®s forte aux influences multiples et vari√©es.

C'est en 2013 que para√Æt le premier morceau, Dorma. Le coup de c≈ìur est instantan√©, √©coutez-moi donc cette volupt√©, cette √©l√©gance, ce chant cristallin ; et surtout, ce sentiment de "jamais entendu" ! Le morceau a longtemps tourn√© en boucle sur mon pc, j'en voulais plus ! Et ce v≈ìu est maintenant exauc√©.

L'album s'ouvre sur Scylla, on retrouve les √©l√©ments qui faisaient la force de Dorma, √† savoir un sens de la composition et de l'ambiance qui file des frissons. Laure Le Prunenec fait la d√©monstration de toute sa palette vocale, avec un timbre tant√¥t cristallin, tant√¥t tr√®s chaleureux, et se permet m√™me quelques passages l√©g√®rement √©corch√©s, d'une puissance √† h√©risser le poil. Sur Arsalein, on reconna√Æt assez facilement le sens tr√®s particulier de la rythmique typique d'Igorrr. Le timbre de la chanteuse se permet encore plus de passages √©corch√©s, tout en proposant des vocalises dignes d'un op√©ra. La fin du morceau est en apoth√©ose, m√™lant des rythmiques dont on ressent l'influence breakcore √† de gros accords satur√©s √† la guitare. Dulcin et Ort proposeront eux aussi cette puissance toute m√©tallique qui pourrait accrocher l'oreille de nos lecteurs les plus accrocs au gros son, mais globalement, leur musique se fait plus sensible, √† fleur de peau.

Cet album se d√©marque vraiment de tout ce que j'ai pu entendre d'autre en folk, notamment par ses influences sorties d'un op√©ra, le tout m√™l√© √† toutes sortes d'√©l√©ments issues de diff√©rents genres. Malgr√© le fait que je sois subjugu√©, j'ai du mal √† en parler dans le d√©tail ; et pour cause, c'est la premi√®re fois que je vous parle d'un album n'√©tant pas du metal. Mais bon sang, pour l'amour de la musique, √©coutez-moi cet album !

Druid coming back to life

Title: Muslimgauze ‚Äé‚Äì Mullah Said (1998) [FULL ALBUM]
Description:
Label: Staalplaat - MUSLIMLIM 018  (July, 1998) (re-pressed May, 2008)
Genre: Electronic
Style: Ambient, Experimental, Tribal

Tracklist
00:00 Mullah Said  (12.17)
12:16 Every Grain Of Palestinian Sand  (10.32)
22:47 Muslims Die India  (12.31)
35:18 Every Grain Of Palestinian Sand  (10.53)
46:15 Muslims Die India  (16.27)
1:02:44 An End  (2.38)

all tracks written/played by Muslimgauze

engineered by John Delf
recorded at the Abraham Mosque, Manchester

'Mullah Said' displays two aspects of the work of Muslimgauze. Firstly, musically, it is in the delightful drifting ambient vein. The percussion is mainly acoustic hand drums - providing a rhythm of aural features - the trademark shimmering string sound heard on a number of releases is much in evidence, rhythms are generally slower, there are lots of samples of people speaking in conversation, markets wherever. 'Mullah said' opens the disc with the lovely mix of these sounds. 'Every grain of Palestine sand' continues the mood, with a slightly faster tempo, and more emphasis on the beat. But it soon locks into a mesmeric lassitude as various effects echo or smear the sounds, drums come in for short moments, different string sounds enjoin the play. 'Muslims die India' follows the mood though the voices seem darker, sadder, and then comes 'Every grain of Palestinian sand' followed by 'Muslims die India'. Yes - not a typo, these tracks are repeated. This is the second Muslimgauze trend - to remix himself. On a number of releases there are tracks with the same title, sometimes called part 1 and 2, and usually they are about the same length and listening indicates they are versions of the same song. With the two here, the samples occur at about the same time, the instrumentation is similar, and what we get is subtle variations - different effects, placement of instruments in the mix etc. This leaves us with a 50 minute suite of prime Muslimgauze middle eastern ambience - if you like that side you will love this album. The final track is short and different, a crackling ground over which a singer chants a song interrupted by machine-gun percussive bursts - 'An end'. For those who have difficulty getting the limited editions, Staalplaat will be releasing 'Observe with Sadiq Bey' which is said to be in the same style.
(Ambience)

Title: Astral Pigs - J'Ngalee (Single 2023)
Description:
https://astralpigsdoom.bandcamp.com/
https://www.facebook.com/funeralelectric
https://www.instagram.com/astralpigsdoom/
Astral Pigs / Cha√±ar Ladeado, Argentin
SIngle from the upcoming album The Uncomplete Offering
Out in 2024
====
lyrics
J'Ngalee

Inside their mind's trails
Vast worms eating back
Awake the suffering inside
Eternally turning back

Feed the hate to this world
The glooming bliss you reach for
Drooling darkness and famines
Burning fire of dark desire

The last immortal king
Doomed to live to tell
Through the age of times
Across the plane of darkness

The last immortal king
Doomed to reincarnate
Through the eternal wheel
Across the age of sadness

In my heart...
In my mind...
J'Ngalee.

Feel the thunder in your soul
The burning bliss you reach for
Immortal fire burns down the throne
Everlasting flame of desire

Feel the lighting in your hands
The burning wish you reaching for
Look up the sky and prey for die
But you ever has to return again
credits
released July 11, 2023
Mixed and Recorded by Bruno Angelino and Fabricio Pieroni

Produced by Astral Pigs

All Rights Reserved

Astral Pigs 2023

Title: The Worlds Is Fake - Creation (Full Album 2023)
Description:
Creation (2023)
https://theworldsisfake.bandcamp.com/
https://www.instagram.com/theworldisfakeband
https://linktr.ee/theworldisfake
The World is Fake is a music project with contours between diverse soundscapes, with rhythmic traits based on fluid dynamics and brushed with spatial wave sound effects that converge between psychedelic and ambient. Proposal framed on an instrumental basis with the addition of sounds from the global environment between the creation and destruction of styles. 
The Worlds Is Fake / Portugal
#Instrumental #Prog_Rock #Post_Rock

Title: SATURNALIA TEMPLE - Paradigm Call [FULL ALBUM] 2024  **including lyrics**
Description:
'Paradigm Call' is an album from Swedish psychedelic stoner/doom metal band Saturnalia Temple released by Listenable Records in 2024.

01 Drakon 0:00
02 Revel In Dissidence 02:07
03 Paradigm Call 11:03
04 Among The Ruins 18:46
05 Black Smoke 24:02
06 Ascending The Pale 31:33
07 Empty Chalice 38:35
08 Kaivalya 43:38

https://listenable-records.bandcamp.com/album/paradigm-call
https://shop-listenable.net/en/
https://www.listenable.eu/
https://www.facebook.com/listenablerecs
https://www.instagram.com/listenable_records
info (at) listenable.net
BAND:
https://www.facebook.com/saturnaliatemple
https://www.instagram.com/saturnaliatemple/
saturnaliatemple (at) gmail.com

LYRICS:
01 Drakon 0:00
- no lyrics -
~
02 Revel In Dissidence 02:07
"Affiliate with the timeless core
Abound in what is never more
Your time and space make no sense
I will revel in dissidence
The social code that breaks you down
Is what you must leave behind
The common sense imprisons you
is what you must annihilate
Magick will the only truth
The only path that emancipates
The state of mind must be sincere
Not the pseudo world of sleep
Affiliate with the timeless core
Abound in what is never more
Your time and space make no sense
I will revel in dissidence"
~
03 Paradigm Call 11:03
"Dead voices of the ages
Rise again in the here and now
Forgotten current
I call now in your hearts and minds
Forget your senses
Turn inwards to live again
The hidden sun is heavy
With power, light and bliss
Don't you ever think
Avoid your clever tricks
The fool is crowned now
In this paradigm call"
~
04 Among The Ruins 18:46
"An empire that never was
Can never crumble
A tower that never stood
Is forever standing
Bricks and stone
Time illusion frames
The fire in our souls
Will burn with your prisons
We of the serpents path
Beyond all reach
Prefer to dwell forever
Among the ruins
~
05 Black Smoke 24:02
"Everything is burning
Inner dragon rise
Black smoke is covering
Universe A B and C
From the graves of the earth
Black smoke
From the stars
Black Smoke
In the fractals of your mind
Black Smoke 
The Qlipoth is here
Black Smoke
Everything is burning
Inner dragon rise
Black smoke is covering
Universe A B and C
From the graves of the earth
Black smoke
From the stars
Black Smoke
In the fractals of your mind
Black Smoke 
The Qlipoth is here
Black Smoke
~
06 Ascending The Pale 31:33
"Veins of magma flow
Bones are wisdom's fold
Flesh is hidden light
Eyes are stars in sight
Ascending the pale
Breathing life and death
Ascending the pale
Breathing life and death
Karmic obstacles fall
Diamond mind of nought
All matter is a gate
I am only change
Ascending the pale
Breathing life and death
Ascending the pale
Breathing life and death
~
07 Empty Chalice 38:35
"Drawing in those around you
To your self pity maze of woe
Three eyes blind and sleeping
Pain is your chosen fate
Empty chalice
Feeble hands grip the chalice
The unholy springs always dry
Blame as an outward instinct
This is not love
but hate
Empty chalice
~
08 Kaivalya 43:38
- no lyrics -

-------
Before I Burn tells stories of egoism, greed, and the evil it promotes within people‚Äôs minds.
When it feels like the whole world is burning, do you punch out, or do you stay and burn?
Drums, bass, and guitars were tracked in the basement of an old building in downtown Oslo. Overdubs for guitar, as well as vocals and keys were tracked in different locations in and around Oslo. Like in the past, the band was in charge of the entire process from songwriting and artwork, to recording and mixing. However, mastering was done by Tony Reed (Mos Generator).
====
released July 26, 2024

All songs written by Magmakammer

Title: Kozmik Makam - Psychedelic Prayers (1977) [Full Album]
Description:
Emerging from Istanbul's unique music culture in the late 1970s, *Kozmik Makam* was a groundbreaking _fictional_ band that pushed the boundaries of sound and spirit. The group was composed of musicians from diverse backgrounds, all of whom shared a deep-rooted interest in music and mysticism. Kozmik Makam fused ancient Anatolian melodies with the innovative rhythms of the West, blending the energetic spontaneity of jazz and Afrobeat with an unmistakable psychedelic flair.

Kozmik Makam began their journey performing on Istanbul's Galata and Kadƒ±k√∂y stages, quickly gaining a following among fans of experimental music. Their sound was hypnotic, often creating a ritualistic atmosphere that felt as ancient as it was fresh. Their debut album, Psychedelic Prayers, was filled with complex rhythms and hypnotic repetitions, offering a deep auditory experience. Each track on the album merged the mystical scales of the Middle East, the rhythmic intensity of Afrobeat, and the free-form improvisation of jazz. Electric guitar riffs intertwined with cosmic funk and powerful basslines, while analog synths and ethnic instruments transported listeners to another dimension.

Kozmik Makam‚Äôs live performances were renowned for their immersive, trance-inducing quality, mirroring the profound depth of their music. With Psychedelic Prayers, they captured the attention of the Turkish music scene and cemented themselves as pioneers of psychedelic rock and jazz fusion. The album was a journey of single-take, extended improvisations, and hypnotic, repetitive rhythms, offering a unique aural experience. Their success in Turkey led to international invitations, and Kozmik Makam soon found themselves performing at music festivals across Europe, particularly in Germany and France.

With the release of their debut album in 1977, Kozmik Makam achieved a cult status not only in Turkey but globally as well. The band seamlessly combined Western progressive rock with the mystical soul of the East, gaining a dedicated fanbase both at home and abroad. In their albums, Kozmik Makam managed to stay true to their roots while embracing the modern world, creating a timeless, universal musical language that spoke to listeners across generations.

The band‚Äôs music, rich with jazz improvisations, complex polyrhythms, ethnic melodies, and mesmerizing layers, offered an expansive auditory landscape. Kozmik Makam‚Äôs Psychedelic Prayers album remains a beloved classic among collectors and music enthusiasts, a testament to the band‚Äôs transcendent and boundary-breaking sound.

Title: Habibi Habbas - Disco Kebab (1977) [Full Album]
Description:
*Habibi Habbas* is one of the most unusual _fictional_ musical groups of the period, formed in Libya in the mid-1970s and uniquely blending psychedelic rock, Arabic pop and funk. The group's name combines the word "Habibi", which reflects the warm and friendly atmosphere of Arab culture, with the expression "Habbas", which refers to groove-filled and energetic music. Their first album, "Funky Caravan", released in 1976, attracted attention both in the local and international music scene and brought them cult status.

The band members developed a unique sound that combined traditional Arabic music with Western psychedelic rock and funk trends. Funky Caravan offers the best examples of this unique music. The songs on the album have a structure enriched with guitar riffs, groovy bass lines, rhythmic percussion and deep, melodic Eastern instruments. The arabesque melodies in their songs create a mystical and hypnotic atmosphere, while the funky rhythms of the West invite the listener to dance.

Although Habibi Habbas did not achieve widespread commercial success, their first album, Funky Caravan, released in 1976, is considered a work that reflects the musical spirit of a period and has achieved cult status years later.

Title: Camellas - Melancholic Desert (1976) [Full Album]
Description:
üéÅ You can support us in the music production process. Thank you!
- https://buymeacoffee.com/heingart
- https://patreon.com/heingart (Patreon) *Camellas* is a fictional psychedelic rock band known for weaving rich, desert-inspired soundscapes and deeply immersive music. Formed in 1973, Camellas emerged at the height of the psychedelic rock era, blending elements of classic rock with unique, atmospheric tones that transport listeners into the heart of an endless desert journey. 

*Band Origins and Style*
Camellas was initially formed by four musicians driven by a shared love for experimental music that blended both Western rock and Middle Eastern influences. Each member brought a distinct element to the band‚Äôs sound‚Äîhypnotic, bluesy guitar riffs, deep, groove-laden bass lines, and drumming inspired by tribal rhythms. The vocals, often drenched in reverb, echo through their tracks like distant calls across the desert, adding a layer of mystique and depth to their music.

*Musical Influence and Desert Aesthetic*
Drawing inspiration from bands like Pink Floyd and The Doors, Camellas developed a sound that felt both otherworldly and grounded. They used desert themes not just as aesthetic, but as a philosophical core. The desert, in Camellas‚Äô music, represents a vast, timeless landscape‚Äîan expanse where one can be lost and found, experience isolation and introspection, and encounter both hardship and beauty.

*Legacy and Cultural Impact*
Though fictional, Camellas would be the kind of band that cultivates a cult following among fans of retro psychedelic rock and those seeking a unique sonic experience. Their music could be seen as both a product of its time‚Äîthe 1970s fascination with mind-expanding music and desert escapism‚Äîand timeless, appealing to fans of modern psychedelic and stoner rock who seek a deep, immersive sound.

Title: Psychomagic - Sadhana (2021) [Full Album]
Description:
üéÅ You can support us in the music production process. Thank you!
- https://buymeacoffee.com/heingart
- https://patreon.com/heingart (Patreon) *Psychomagic* is a fictional experimental psychedelic fusion collective formed in 2018 in Portland, Oregon. The group's unique sound presents an innovative synthesis of traditional Middle Eastern music with contemporary psychedelic rock and electronic elements.

The band takes its name from Alejandro Jodorowsky's concept of "Psychomagic," which combines psychotherapy with shamanic rituals. This philosophical approach is reflected in the group's musical vision.

*Current lineup:*
-Sarah Chen: Electric guitar, sitar guitar
-Omar Malik: Bass, synthesizer
-David Harrison: Drums, electronic percussion
-Maya Patel: Keys, analog synthesizer
-Alex Torres: Tabla, percussion

Their 2021 album "Sadhana," named after the Hindu practice of spiritual development and inner enlightenment, is considered a milestone in the band's musical maturity. Each track is named after minerals and natural elements, representing different stages of a meditative journey.

*Psychomagic's music is characterized by:*
-Masterful blending of Eastern and Western instrumentation
-Complex polyrhythmic structures
-Extended hypnotic jam sections
-Organic integration of analog and digital synthesizers
-Layered textures built on minimal repetition
-Modern interpretations of traditional Middle Eastern modes

*The group's sound seamlessly integrates:*
-Middle Eastern-inspired scales
-Jazz fusion harmonies
-Progressive rock structures
-Electronic textures
-Tribal percussion patterns
-Ambient soundscapes
-Psychedelic funk grooves

"Sadhana" showcases the band's evolution, featuring eleven tracks that flow together as a cohesive sonic journey. The album's production emphasizes warm analog tones, reverb-heavy atmospheres, and intricate layering of instruments.

Psychomagic has carved out a unique place in the underground music scene as an innovative group successfully blending traditional and modern elements, East and West, acoustic and electronic. Their music creates immersive soundscapes that invite listeners on a transcendent journey through sound.

The band continues to push boundaries in the experimental music scene, gaining recognition for their unique approach to psychedelic fusion and their ability to create transformative musical experiences.

Title: Habibi Hafla Hits with MzRizk
Description:
Copyright restrictions pose a challenge for our channel. YouTube automatically monetizes the songs in this mix, directing ad revenue to copyright owners. This means we can‚Äôt control the ads or their frequency. As a result, 99.9% of MAJ‚Äôs yearly viewership generates no income for us due to copyrighted music.

MAJ‚Äôs mission is to share high-quality vinyl-only mixes. To continue, we need support to maintain our studio and cover expenses. Please consider supporting us on Patreon.
https://www.patreon.com/myanalogjournal

Or make a one-time donation with no sign-up:
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/MyAnalogJournal
---------------------
MzRizk is a renowned Melbourne-based DJ, event curator, and cultural tastemaker known for her seamless blend of Arabic music with house, hip-hop, soul, funk, disco, jazz, and global grooves. She runs Habibi Hafla, a celebrated event series that brings communities together to enjoy music, dance, and culture. With her genre-spanning sets and deep appreciation for storytelling through sound, MzRizk creates inclusive, vibrant spaces, continuing to make her mark on Melbourne‚Äôs music scene, and internationally. MzRizk has recently played sets at We Out Here 2024, and Sole DXB 2024.

MzRizk‚Äôs MAJ set "Habibi Hafla Hits" is a carefully curated selection of her favourite Arabic classics. A nostalgic journey through records collected from Lebanon and Egypt showcasing the breadth of sounds and rhythms from across the region.

08. Spit Lube - 23:30

VINYL/CD: bit.ly/32juln0

After the long awaited release of their second album, Terraform, Yo No Se return with an album of ‚ÄúB Sides‚Äù and tracks recorded during the first UK lockdown. Having been away for so long the band have been sitting on a lot of material and we‚Äôre delighted to get these tracks out there.

Some of the songs are taken from the Terraform recording session while others were recorded at home and features a very different side to Yo No Se. Using bouzouki and cello to explore and expand their sound as well as slipping in a cover of Bert Jansch‚Äôs Poison. Theres several different members, engineers and locations in this album which were again mastered by Jack Endino.

Continuing on where Terraform left off the album continues to explore corruption, paranoia, new world exploration and anarchy.

released January 28, 2022

Born To Struggle
Alex Studer (Guitar & Vocals), Jason Strickland (Bass), Matt Neicho (Drums)
Recorded by Dom Mitchison. Mixed by Ali Chant

FAQ:

1. What kind of projects CAN I use White Bat Audio music in?
- Projects such as: films, animations, YouTube videos, live streams, video games and podcasts.
- My music is 100% copyright safe so you can use it in your creative/visual project, just credit me "music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio". You must credit me in the video description when using my music in a video on YouTube.


2. What can I NOT use White Bat Audio music in?
- Music projects such as: sampling my music and placing it in your song, recording vocals over my music, or re-releasing my music under a different name/title.
- If you use my music in your film or game, you CANNOT sell/distribute the soundtrack separately from the film/game. For example, you cannot upload the music soundtrack of your project to Spotify (or other audio streaming services) with my music included.


3. How do I credit you?
- "Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio" is fine. You can put the song title too if you like.
‚Äì When using my music on YouTube, you must put the credit in the video description.

4. Can I record vocals on your music and upload to Spotify, Apple Music etc.?
- No.


5. Can I use your music in videos/projects that are monetized?
- Yes!


6. Why did I get a copyright claim when using your music?
‚Äì It is either something else in your video, FB or Twitch being overly sensitive with their copyright detection software, or you have not credited me properly. You must credit me in the video description when using my music in a video on YouTube.
-  If you receive a copyright claim when using my music on YouTube and you are sure you've credited me correctly in the video description, you can simply fill out this form and the claim will be dealt with very quickly: https://forms.gle/X5QvKPN1YEx7eiKV7
- Once you've filled out the above form, you can dispute the claim on YouTube and it will be dropped.
